Borrowed Time

You are fuelled with an unexpected energy when saving an ally from a Hook.
<p>Survivors you unhook benefit from the following effects:
* '''Extends''' the duration of their '''''Endurance<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* '''Extends''' the duration of their '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10 seconds</span>'''.

You are fuelled with an unexpected energy when saving an ally from a Hook.

Survivors you unhook benefit from the following effects:

  • Extends the duration of their Endurance Status Effect by 6/8/10 seconds.
  • Extends the duration of their Haste Status Effect by 10 seconds.

"Probably stings like hell, but it ain't gonna kill ya. Up and at 'em soldier. Time to move!" — Bill Overbeck

 Bill
Botany Knowledge

You transform plants found around The Campfire into tinctures that slow down bleeding.
* '''Increases''' your Healing speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* '''Reduces''' the Healing efficiency of [[Med-Kits]]<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">-20 %</span>'''.

You transform plants found around The Campfire into tinctures that slow down bleeding.
  • Increases your Healing speed by 30/40/50 %.
  • Reduces the Healing efficiency of Med-Kits by -20 %.

"Basic Botany Knowledge could save your life someday" — Claudette Morel

 Claudette
Breakdown

Each time you are unhooked or unhook yourself, the Hook<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> breaks and the Killer's Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* A Hook broken by ''Breakdown'' takes '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">180 seconds</span>''' to respawn.

Each time you are unhooked or unhook yourself, the Hook breaks and the Killer's Aura is revealed to you for 4/5/6 seconds.
  • A Hook broken by Breakdown takes 180 seconds to respawn.

"Charge from the Belly of the Beast.
Here's a sketch/painting on a piece of wood I saw by the side of this road. I felt like it got a story to tell. And it didn't waste its second chance." — Jeff, ink and oil wash on slice of wood, 12x16

 Jeff
Breakout

You kick into high gear when someone is in trouble, inspiring them to overcome any obstacle.

When within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5 metres</span>''' of a carried Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, the following benefits apply:
*Grants a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">7</span>''' '''&#37;''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
*'''Increases''' the Wiggle speed of the carried Survivor by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">+25 %</span>'''.

Survivors can only be affected by one instance of ''Breakout'' at a time.

You kick into high gear when someone is in trouble, inspiring them to overcome any obstacle.

When within 5 metres of a carried Survivor, the following benefits apply:

  • Grants a 5/6/7 % Haste Status Effect.
  • Increases the Wiggle speed of the carried Survivor by +25 %.

Survivors can only be affected by one instance of Breakout at a time.

"Come, we are going to rip our way out of this." — Yui Kimura

 Yui
Buckle Up

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
<p>When healing a Survivor in the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Buckle Up'' activates:
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the Killer is revealed to the both of you.
<p>
*Completing a ''Healing Action'' on the dying Survivor grants both of you the '''''Endurance<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

When healing a Survivor in the Dying State, Buckle Up activates:

  • The Aura of the Killer is revealed to the both of you.

  • Completing a Healing Action on the dying Survivor grants both of you the Endurance Status Effect for 6/8/10 seconds.
"Ghost beaters never leave a man behind." — Ash Williams
 Ash
Built to Last

You know how to get the most out of your tools.

Hiding inside a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">14</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">13</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">12</span>''' '''seconds''' while carrying a depleted Item<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> will replenish its Charges to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">99 %</span>'''.

Each use of ''Built to Last'' reduces this percentage by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">-33 %</span>'''.

You know how to get the most out of your tools.

Hiding inside a Locker for 14/13/12 seconds while carrying a depleted Item will replenish its Charges to 99 %.
Each use of Built to Last reduces this percentage by -33 %.

"Architecture is the soul of civilisation." — Felix Richter
 Felix
Calm Spirit

Animals seem to trust you as they often stay calm in your presence.
*'''Prevents''' Crows<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> from being alerted by your proximity and flying off, unless they are being stepped on.
*'''Suppresses''' the urge to scream from any cause at all times.
*'''Suppresses''' all noises related to unlocking Chests<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and cleansing or blessing Totems<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
**'''Reduces''' their Interaction speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;'''.


Animals seem to trust you as they often stay calm in your presence.
  • Prevents Crows from being alerted by your proximity and flying off, unless they are being stepped on.
  • Suppresses the urge to scream from any cause at all times.
  • Suppresses all noises related to unlocking Chests, and cleansing or blessing Totems.
    • Reduces their Interaction speed by 40/35/30 %.
 Jake
Chemical Trap

In the Fog, an officer must adapt to the materials at hand.
<p>After repairing Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for a total of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;''', ''Chemical Trap'' activates:
*While standing next to a dropped Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, press the ''Active Ability button'' to install a Trap, which stays active for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">110</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">120</span>''' '''seconds'''.
**The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of ''Trapped Pallets'' are revealed to all Survivors in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.
**When the Killer breaks the ''Trapped Pallet'' by any means, the Trap explodes, slowing the Killer by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">-50 %</span>''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">4 seconds</span>'''.

In the Fog, an officer must adapt to the materials at hand.

After repairing Generators for a total of 70/60/50 %, Chemical Trap activates:

  • While standing next to a dropped Pallet, press the Active Ability button to install a Trap, which stays active for 100/110/120 seconds.
    • The Aura of Trapped Pallets are revealed to all Survivors in yellow.
    • When the Killer breaks the Trapped Pallet by any means, the Trap explodes, slowing the Killer by -50 % for 4 seconds.
"How do we kill it, Ash?" — Ellen Ripley
 Ellen
Clairvoyance

There is an intrinsic energy in you that sees beyond your vision.
<p>Whenever you cleanse or bless a Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Clairvoyance'' activates:
*When empty-handed, press and hold the ''Ability button'' to unlock your full Aura-reading potential, allowing you to see the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the Exit Gate Switches<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Hooks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Chests<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and the Hatch<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">64 metres</span>''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.

There is an intrinsic energy in you that sees beyond your vision.

Whenever you cleanse or bless a Totem, Clairvoyance activates:

  • When empty-handed, press and hold the Ability button to unlock your full Aura-reading potential, allowing you to see the Auras of the Exit Gate Switches, Generators, Hooks, Chests, and the Hatch within 64 metres for 8/9/10 seconds.
"Does anyone else see that? Just me?" — Mikaela Reid
 Mikaela
Corrective Action

You quickly analyse problems and correct others' work when they make a mistake.
<p>You start the Trial with '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''Token(s)''' and gain a Token each time you succeed at a Great Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5 Tokens</span>'''.
*Each time another Survivor cooperating with you fails a Skill Check, ''Corrective Action'' consumes '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 Token</span>''', transforming their Failed Skill Check into Good Skill Check instead.

''Corrective Action'' only applies to normal Skill Checks.

You quickly analyse problems and correct others' work when they make a mistake.

You start the Trial with 1/2/3 Token(s) and gain a Token each time you succeed at a Great Skill Check, up to a maximum of 5 Tokens.

  • Each time another Survivor cooperating with you fails a Skill Check, Corrective Action consumes 1 Token, transforming their Failed Skill Check into Good Skill Check instead.
Corrective Action only applies to normal Skill Checks.

"Cannot hurt to have another set of eyes on the problem." — Jonah Vasquez

 Jonah
Counterforce

You know how to withstand an enemy stronger than you, and it starts with hunting down and knocking out their support.

You cleanse Totems<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20 %</span>''' faster.
*Gain another, stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">20 %</span>''' Cleansing Speed bonus per cleansed Totem.
*After cleansing a Totem, the Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the Totem farthest from you is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You know how to withstand an enemy stronger than you, and it starts with hunting down and knocking out their support.

You cleanse Totems 20 % faster.

  • Gain another, stack-able 20 % Cleansing Speed bonus per cleansed Totem.
  • After cleansing a Totem, the Aura of the Totem farthest from you is revealed to you for 2/3/4 seconds.
"I don't mind a little detective work." — Jill Valentine
 Jill
Cut Loose

You get in enough trouble, you know how to get out of it.
<p>After performing a ''Rush Vault action'' in a Chase, ''Cut Loose'' activates for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''seconds''':
*'''Suppresses''' both the ''Loud Noise Notification'' and the sound effects triggered by rushing to vault.
*Successfully performing another ''Rush Vault action'' while ''Cut Loose'' is active resets the timer.


<p>''Cut Loose'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">45 seconds</span>'''.

You get in enough trouble, you know how to get out of it.

After performing a Rush Vault action in a Chase, Cut Loose activates for the next 4/5/6 seconds:

  • Suppresses both the Loud Noise Notification and the sound effects triggered by rushing to vault.
  • Successfully performing another Rush Vault action while Cut Loose is active resets the timer.

Cut Loose has a cool-down of 45 seconds.

"I know how we can get out of here! Quick, this way!" — Thalita Lyra

 Thalita
Dance With Me

When performing a ''Rush Vault action'' or when rushing out of a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, you will not leave any Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Dance With Me'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.

When performing a Rush Vault action or when rushing out of a Locker, you will not leave any Scratch Marks for the next 3 seconds.

Dance With Me has a cool-down of 60/50/40 seconds.

"Another show's off and runnin',
Dance with me, cuz there's a storm a commin'
Follow my boots, try to keep up,
Dance with me, until sun up." — Kate Denson's "Dance with Me"

 Kate
Dark Sense

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
<p>Each time a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>is completed, ''Dark Sense'' activates:
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the Killer is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds''', as soon as they come within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24 metres</span>''' of your location, after which ''Dark Sense'' deactivates.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:

Each time a Generatoris completed, Dark Sense activates:

  • The Aura of the Killer is revealed to you for 5/7/10 seconds, as soon as they come within 24 metres of your location, after which Dark Sense deactivates.
"Take it from an old-timer: Slow down, don't rush and try not to worry so much! The best way to beat him is to know how he thinks." — Murf, The Lost Tapes
 .All
Dead Hard

You can take a beating.
<p>''Dead Hard'' activates after being unhooked or unhooking yourself.
<p>When you are injured, tap into your adrenaline bank to avoid damage.
* Press the ''Active Ability button'' while running to trigger the '''''Endurance<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">0.5 seconds</span>'''.
* ''Dead Hard'' then deactivates.
<p>''Dead Hard'' causes the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Dead Hard'' cannot be used when '''''Exhausted'''''.

You can take a beating.

Dead Hard activates after being unhooked or unhooking yourself.

When you are injured, tap into your adrenaline bank to avoid damage.

  • Press the Active Ability button while running to trigger the Endurance Status Effect for 0.5 seconds.
  • Dead Hard then deactivates.

Dead Hard causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.

Dead Hard cannot be used when Exhausted.

"We were walkin' through t'ginnel one night when a beer bottle flew past me, then another, and another.
I thought to myself "Gonna 'ave some fun 'ere lads, let's get stuck in!".
It were a right dust up, I swear down!" — David King

 David
Deception

Your adventurous lifestyle requires moments of crafty misdirection.
<p>Interacting with a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while holding the ''Sprint button'' has the following effects:
*You do not enter the Locker.
*The Locker's doors swing open and close swiftly, feining a Survivor entering it.
*Triggers a ''Loud Noise Notification'' at the Locker's location, feining a Survivor rushing to enter it.
*'''Suppresses''' the creation of Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 seconds</span>'''.

''Deception'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Your adventurous lifestyle requires moments of crafty misdirection.

Interacting with a Locker while holding the Sprint button has the following effects:

  • You do not enter the Locker.
  • The Locker's doors swing open and close swiftly, feining a Survivor entering it.
  • Triggers a Loud Noise Notification at the Locker's location, feining a Survivor rushing to enter it.
  • Suppresses the creation of Scratch Marks and Pools of Blood for 3 seconds.
Deception has a cool-down of 60/50/40 seconds.
 Élodie
Decisive Strike

Using whatever is at hand, you stab your aggressor in an ultimate attempt to escape.
<p>After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, ''Decisive Strike'' activates for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds''':
*When being grabbed or picked up by the Killer, succeed a Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to automatically escape their grasp, stunning them for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 seconds</span>'''.
*Successfuly stunning the Killer will disable ''Decisive Strike'' for the remainder of the Trial and result in you becoming the '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>'''''.


<p>While ''Decisive Strike'' is active, performing ''Conspicuous Actions'' will deactivate it for the remainder of the Trial.
<p>''Decisive Strike'' deactivates once the Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are powered.
<p>Increases the Odds of becoming the initial '''''Obsession''''' of the Killer by '''+100 %'''.

''The Killer can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

Using whatever is at hand, you stab your aggressor in an ultimate attempt to escape.

After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, Decisive Strike activates for the next 40/50/60 seconds:

  • When being grabbed or picked up by the Killer, succeed a Skill Check to automatically escape their grasp, stunning them for 3 seconds.
  • Successfuly stunning the Killer will disable Decisive Strike for the remainder of the Trial and result in you becoming the Obsession.

While Decisive Strike is active, performing Conspicuous Actions will deactivate it for the remainder of the Trial.

Decisive Strike deactivates once the Exit Gates are powered.

Increases the Odds of becoming the initial Obsession of the Killer by +100 %.
The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"There is nothing to be scared of." — Laurie Strode

 Laurie
Deliverance

After performing a Safe Hook Rescue on another Survivor, ''Deliverance'' activates:
*Causes your next Self-Unhook attempt to always succeed.
*Causes the '''''Broken<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds''' after unhooking yourself.

''Deliverance'' is not available during the second Hook Stage or if you are hooked as the last living Survivor in the Trial, regardless of your Hook Stage then.

After performing a Safe Hook Rescue on another Survivor, Deliverance activates:
  • Causes your next Self-Unhook attempt to always succeed.
  • Causes the Broken Status Effect for 100/80/60 seconds after unhooking yourself.

Deliverance is not available during the second Hook Stage or if you are hooked as the last living Survivor in the Trial, regardless of your Hook Stage then.

"I was raised by a strict man who taught me how to make the best of a bad situation." — Adam Francis

 Adam
Desperate Measures

You refuse to fail, even during your darkest hour.
* '''Increases''' your Action speeds in Healing and Unhooking by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">14</span>''' '''&#37;''' for each injured, hooked, or dying Survivor, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">48</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">56</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

You refuse to fail, even during your darkest hour.
  • Increases your Action speeds in Healing and Unhooking by 10/12/14 % for each injured, hooked, or dying Survivor, up to a maximum of 40/48/56 %.

"When they come with a wrecking ball, build stronger walls." — Felix Richter

 Felix
Detective's Hunch

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

Each time a Generator is completed, the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of any Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Chests<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and Totems<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">48</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">64</span>''' '''metres''' are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">10 seconds</span>'''.
* If you are holding a Maps|Map<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, any objects revealed by ''Detective's Hunch'' will automatically be tracked by it.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

Each time a Generator is completed, the Auras of any Generators, Chests, and Totemswithin 32/48/64 metres are revealed to you for 10 seconds.

  • If you are holding a Map, any objects revealed by Detective's Hunch will automatically be tracked by it.

"Are you able to tell us where you were last night?" — Detective David Tapp

 David
Distortion

Start the Trial with '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 Tokens</span>'''.
<p>Whenever the Killer attempts to read your Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Distortion'' activates, consuming '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 Token</span>''', and the following effects apply:
*'''Blocks''' your Aura from being read for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*'''Suppresses''' the creation of Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.

For every '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">30 seconds</span>''' you are within the Killer's Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Distortion'' recharges '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">1 Token</span>'''.
<p>''Distortion'' cannot accumulate more Tokens than its initial count.
<p>''Distortion'' does not activate when you are in the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Start the Trial with 3 Tokens.

Whenever the Killer attempts to read your Aura, Distortion activates, consuming 1 Token, and the following effects apply:

  • Blocks your Aura from being read for the next 6/8/10 seconds.
  • Suppresses the creation of Scratch Marks for the next 6/8/10 seconds.
For every 30 seconds you are within the Killer's Terror Radius, Distortion recharges 1 Token.

Distortion cannot accumulate more Tokens than its initial count.

Distortion does not activate when you are in the Dying State.

"Death Fooled by the Cloak of Falcon Feathers.
Sketch inspired by a few sleepless nights during winter. Exploration of Norse mythology: bravery can conceal your flaws, even when you are at your most vulnerable." — Jeff, pencil on tone paper, 12x12

 Jeff
Diversion

After being within the Killer's Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''' without being chased, ''Diversion'' activates:
* Press the ''Active Ability button'' while crouched and motionless to throw a pebble, creating a distraction for the Killer at a distance of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20 metres</span>''' from your location.
<p>The distraction consists of the following:
* Triggers a ''Loud Noise Notification''.
* Creates fake Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
<p>''Diversion'' deactivates after use and resets its timer.

After being within the Killer's Terror Radius for 40/35/30 seconds without being chased, Diversion activates:
  • Press the Active Ability button while crouched and motionless to throw a pebble, creating a distraction for the Killer at a distance of 20 metres from your location.

The distraction consists of the following:

  • Triggers a Loud Noise Notification.
  • Creates fake Scratch Marks.

Diversion deactivates after use and resets its timer.

"There's what is easy and then there's what is right. If you confuse the two, there's no telling what you become." — Adam Francis

 Adam
Dramaturgy

When people bring you on to their project, they do so because of the unexpected magic you bring to your performance.
<p>Whenever you are Healthy<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Dramaturgy'' activates:
*While running, press the ''Active Ability button'' to run with knees high for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">0.5 seconds</span>''' to gain a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">+25 %</span>''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">2 seconds</span>''', followed by one of the following effects:
**Suffer from the '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">12 seconds</span>'''.
**Extend the duration of the '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for another '''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">2 seconds</span>'''.
**Scream, but without notifying the Killer.
**Receive a random Item<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">Rare</span>''' Rarity, with a random selection of [[Add-ons]]<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> attached to it, automatically dropping any previously held Item.
*''The same effect cannot happen twice in a row.''


<p>''Dramaturgy'' causes the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Dramaturgy'' cannot be used when '''''Exhausted'''''.

When people bring you on to their project, they do so because of the unexpected magic you bring to your performance.

Whenever you are Healthy, Dramaturgy activates:

  • While running, press the Active Ability button to run with knees high for 0.5 seconds to gain a +25 % Haste Status Effect for 2 seconds, followed by one of the following effects:
    • Suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 12 seconds.
    • Extend the duration of the Haste Status Effect for another 2 seconds.
    • Scream, but without notifying the Killer.
    • Receive a random Item of Rare Rarity, with a random selection of Add-ons attached to it, automatically dropping any previously held Item.
  • The same effect cannot happen twice in a row.

Dramaturgy causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.

Dramaturgy cannot be used when Exhausted.

"Take the part. It's a good movie, he says. What's the worst that can happen?" — Nicolas Cage

 Nicolas
Déjà Vu

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
<p>Paranoia paired with your horror of failure helps prepare you from repeating the same mistakes.
*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>''' Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, who are currently in closest proximity to one another, are revealed to you at all times.
*'''Increases''' your Repair speed on those Generators by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''&#37;'''.


* If you are holding a Maps|Map<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, all Generators revealed by ''Déjà Vu'' are automatically added to it.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:

Paranoia paired with your horror of failure helps prepare you from repeating the same mistakes.

  • The Auras of the 3 Generators, who are currently in closest proximity to one another, are revealed to you at all times.
  • Increases your Repair speed on those Generators by 4/5/6 %.
  • If you are holding a Map, all Generators revealed by Déjà Vu are automatically added to it.

Your presence psychically projects itself to those in danger.
*Whenever another Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is injured, they can see your Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> when within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">64</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">96</span>''' '''metres''' of your location.

  • You heal other Survivors 10 % faster.

Empathy

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or in the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">64</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">96</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">128</span>''' '''metres''' of your location are revealed to you.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:

Empathy does not reveal the Aura of a Survivor being carried by the Killer.

Fast Track

Sometimes the sacrifice of others is necessary to get ahead.

Whenever another Survivor is hooked, ''Fast Track'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''Tokens''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">27</span>''' '''Tokens'''.
* You consume all accumulated Tokens after a Great Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
* Each Token grants a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 %</span>''' Progression bonus in addition to the default Progression bonus for succeeding a Great Skill Check.

Sometimes the sacrifice of others is necessary to get ahead.

Whenever another Survivor is hooked, Fast Track gains 1/2/3 Tokens, up to a maximum of 9/18/27 Tokens.

  • You consume all accumulated Tokens after a Great Skill Check on a Generator.
  • Each Token grants a stack-able 1 % Progression bonus in addition to the default Progression bonus for succeeding a Great Skill Check.

Flashbang

You have adapted to a world in chaos and making what you can from the debris.
<p>After repairing Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for a total of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;''', ''Flashbang'' activates:
*Enter any Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and press the ''Ability button'' to craft a Flash Grenade<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

The ''Flashbang'' is left behind when escaping the Trial.

You have adapted to a world in chaos and making what you can from the debris.

  • Enter any Locker and press the Ability button to craft a Flash Grenade.
The Flashbang is left behind when escaping the Trial.

Flip-Flop

You have an uncanny ability to escape the inevitable.

You have an uncanny ability to escape the inevitable.

While in the Dying State, 50 % of your Recovery progression is converted into Wiggling progression, up to a maximum of 40/45/50 %, once you are picked up by the Killer.

Fogwise

In your countless years in The Fog, you have seen it all, and when you are focused, you can remember most of it too.
* Succeeding a Great Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while repairing a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> reveals the Killer's Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''seconds'''.

In your countless years in The Fog, you have seen it all, and when you are focused, you can remember most of it too.
  • Succeeding a Great Skill Check while repairing a Generator reveals the Killer's Aura to you for 4/5/6 seconds.
