For the People

You risk life and injury for others.
<p>While healthy and healing another Survivor without using a [[Med-Kit]]<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, press the ''Active Ability button'' to activate ''For the People'':
*Trades '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>''' Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> with that Survivor:
**'''Instantly''' heals them to the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, if they were dying or suffering from the '''''Deep Wound<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
**'''Instantly''' heals them to full health, if they were injured.
*You yourself become injured and suffer from the '''''Broken<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*You become the Killer's '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', if not already.


<p>Reduces the Odds of becoming the initial '''''Obsession''''' of the Killer by '''-100 %'''.

''The Killer can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You risk life and injury for others.

While healthy and healing another Survivor without using a Med-Kit, press the Active Ability button to activate For the People:

  • Trades 1 Health State with that Survivor:
    • Instantly heals them to the Injured State, if they were dying or suffering from the Deep Wound Status Effect.
    • Instantly heals them to full health, if they were injured.
  • You yourself become injured and suffer from the Broken Status Effect for the next 80/70/60 seconds.
  • You become the Killer's Obsession, if not already.

Reduces the Odds of becoming the initial Obsession of the Killer by -100 %.
The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"We can write our own story and decide how it really ends." — Zarina Kassir

 Zarina
Friendly Competition

You revel in the community spirit of a competition, and inspire others to follow suit.
<p>Whenever you complete a Generator with at least one other Survivor, ''Friendly Competition'' activates:
*'''Increases''' your Repair speed, and that of the other Survivor(s) who completed the repairs with you, by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">+5 %</span>''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">45</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">75</span>''' '''seconds'''.


You revel in the community spirit of a competition, and inspire others to follow suit.

Whenever you complete a Generator with at least one other Survivor, Friendly Competition activates:

  • Increases your Repair speed, and that of the other Survivor(s) who completed the repairs with you, by +5 % for the next 45/60/75 seconds.

"C'mon, let's do this!" — Thalita Lyra

 Thalita
Guardian

You risk it all to help those in need.

When you unhook a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, the rescued Survivor benefits from the following effects for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''seconds''':
*Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are suppressed.
*Additional '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">7 %</span>''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''', boosting their Movement speed.

''Guardian'' reveals the Killer's Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">8 seconds</span>'''.

You risk it all to help those in need.

When you unhook a Survivor, the rescued Survivor benefits from the following effects for 4/6/8 seconds:

  • Scratch Marks and Pools of Blood are suppressed.
  • Additional 7 % Haste Status Effect, boosting their Movement speed.
Guardian reveals the Killer's Aura to you for 8 seconds.
 .All
Head On

When your mind is set, there better be no one standing in your way.
<p>While standing in a '''Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 seconds</span>''', ''Head On'' activates:
* When rushing out of a Locker, stun the Killer for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">3 seconds</span>''' if they are within range.
<p>''Head On'' causes the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Head On'' cannot be used when '''''Exhausted''''' or when you have accrued Idle Crows<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

When your mind is set, there better be no one standing in your way.

While standing in a Locker for 3 seconds, Head On activates:

  • When rushing out of a Locker, stun the Killer for 3 seconds if they are within range.

Head On causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.

Head On cannot be used when Exhausted or when you have accrued Idle Crows.

"People are remembered for the challenges they overcome. You can run away and forget what you're capable of or you can face your fears and remind the world of who you are." — Jane Romero

 Jane
Hope

The growing odds of a successful escape fill you with hope and give you wings
<p>Once the Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are powered, ''Hope'' activates:
*Grants a permanent '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">7</span>''' '''&#37;''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.

The growing odds of a successful escape fill you with hope and give you wings

Once the Exit Gates are powered, Hope activates:

  • Grants a permanent 5/6/7 % Haste Status Effect.
"Buckle up, fuckos! Let's roll." — Nikki, The Lost Tapes
 .All
Hyperfocus

You throw yourself entirely into your tasks and find ways to be more efficient than anyone else.
<p>After hitting a Great Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while repairing or healing, ''Hyperfocus'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">6 Tokens</span>'''

For each Token, the following stack-able effects are applied:
*'''Increases''' the Skill Check Trigger odds by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">+4 %</span>''' per Token.
*'''Increases''' the Skill Check Rotation speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">+4 %</span>''' per Token.
*'''Increases''' the Skill Check Bonus progression by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;''' of its base value per Token.

''Hyperfocus'' loses all Tokens when succeeding a Good Skill Check, failing a Skill Check, or if the action is interrupted by any means.

You throw yourself entirely into your tasks and find ways to be more efficient than anyone else.

After hitting a Great Skill Check while repairing or healing, Hyperfocus gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 6 Tokens
For each Token, the following stack-able effects are applied:

  • Increases the Skill Check Trigger odds by +4 % per Token.
  • Increases the Skill Check Rotation speed by +4 % per Token.
  • Increases the Skill Check Bonus progression by 10/20/30 % of its base value per Token.
Hyperfocus loses all Tokens when succeeding a Good Skill Check, failing a Skill Check, or if the action is interrupted by any means.
 Rebecca
Inner Focus

You have honed your ability to see through the haze of the Ravage.
*You can see the Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of other Survivors.
*Whenever another Survivor loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">32 metres</span>''' of you, the Killer's Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You have honed your ability to see through the haze of the Ravage.
  • You can see the Scratch Marks of other Survivors.
  • Whenever another Survivor loses a Health State within 32 metres of you, the Killer's Aura is revealed to you for 3/4/5 seconds.
"The death, the trauma, the fear... it all leads here. The Overlap." — Haddie Kaur, Ravages of the Abyss Episode 11
 Haddie
Inner Healing

You look inwards and trust your instincts when you feel lost and alone.

Each time you cleanse a Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Inner Healing'' activates:
*You are automatically healed '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Health State</span>''' when hiding inside a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''seconds''' while injured or suffering from the '''''Deep Wound<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.

''Inner Healing'' does not activate if you currently suffer from the '''''Broken<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.

You look inwards and trust your instincts when you feel lost and alone.

Each time you cleanse a Totem, Inner Healing activates:

  • You are automatically healed 1 Health State when hiding inside a Locker for 10/9/8 seconds while injured or suffering from the Deep Wound Status Effect.
Inner Healing does not activate if you currently suffer from the Broken Status Effect.
 .All
Iron Will

You are able to concentrate and enter a meditative-like state to numb some pain.
* '''Reduces''' the volume of ''Grunts of Pain'' while in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">75</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
<p>''Iron Will'' cannot be used when suffering from '''''Exhaustion''''', but does not cause the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.

You are able to concentrate and enter a meditative-like state to numb some pain.
  • Reduces the volume of Grunts of Pain while in the Injured State by 25/50/75 %.

Iron Will cannot be used when suffering from Exhaustion, but does not cause the Exhausted Status Effect.

 Jake
Kindred

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
<p>While you are hooked:
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are revealed to one another.
* Whenever the Killer is within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''metres''' of your Hook, their Aura is revealed to all Survivors.
<p>While any other Survivor is hooked:
* The Auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you.
* Whenever the Killer is within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''metres''' of the hooked Survivor, their Aura is revealed to you.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:

While you are hooked:

  • The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to one another.
  • Whenever the Killer is within 8/12/16 metres of your Hook, their Aura is revealed to all Survivors.

While any other Survivor is hooked:

  • The Auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you.
  • Whenever the Killer is within 8/12/16 metres of the hooked Survivor, their Aura is revealed to you.

"Be kind to one another, We're all in this together" — Sujan, The Lost Tapes

 .All
Kinship

The importance of friendship has given you strength.

While you are on the Hook<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> in the ''Struggle Phase'', ''Kinship'' activates:
*If another Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16 metres</span>''' of your Hook while ''Kinship'' is active, the ''Struggle Phase'' timer is paused for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">26</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">34</span>''' '''seconds'''.


The importance of friendship has given you strength.

While you are on the Hook in the Struggle Phase, Kinship activates:

  • If another Survivor is within 16 metres of your Hook while Kinship is active, the Struggle Phase timer is paused for 26/30/34 seconds.
 .All
Leader

You are able to organise a team to cooperate more efficiently.
* '''Increases''' the Action speeds of other Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> in Healing, Sabotaging, Unhooking, Cleansing, Opening, and Unlocking by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''&#37;''' while they are within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8 metres</span>''' of your location.
* This effect lingers for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">15 seconds</span>''' when leaving ''Leader's'' range.
<p>Survivors can only be affected by one instance of ''Leader'' at a time.

You are able to organise a team to cooperate more efficiently.
  • Increases the Action speeds of other Survivors in Healing, Sabotaging, Unhooking, Cleansing, Opening, and Unlocking by 15/20/25 % while they are within 8 metres of your location.
  • This effect lingers for 15 seconds when leaving Leader's range.

Survivors can only be affected by one instance of Leader at a time.

 Dwight
Left Behind

You will get the job done... no matter the cost.

When you are the last Survivor remaining in the Trial, the Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the Hatch<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is revealed to you when you are within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">32</span>''' '''metres'''.

You will get the job done... no matter the cost.

When you are the last Survivor remaining in the Trial, the Aura of the Hatch is revealed to you when you are within 24/28/32 metres.

"I'm not horse-shittin' around. I'm doing this alone!" — Bill Overbeck

 Bill
Light-Footed

Crossing paths with deadly Killers has taught you the value of discretion.
<p>Whenever you are healthy, ''Light-Footed'' activates:
*'''Suppresses''' the sound of your footsteps while running.

''Light-Footed'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''seconds''' after performing a ''Rush Vault action''.

Crossing paths with deadly Killers has taught you the value of discretion.

Whenever you are healthy, Light-Footed activates:

  • Suppresses the sound of your footsteps while running.
Light-Footed has a cool-down of 28/24/20 seconds after performing a Rush Vault action.

"Come on, cat." — Ellen Ripley

 Ellen
Lightweight

Your running is light and soft, making your tracks harder to follow.
* '''Reduces''' the duration of your Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* Your Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are spaced inconsistently.

Your running is light and soft, making your tracks harder to follow.
  • Reduces the duration of your Scratch Marks by 3/4/5 seconds.
  • Your Scratch Marks are spaced inconsistently.

"Take it slow, he knows where you have been... just like I have always said:
'live slow and die old'." — Dylan, The Lost Tapes

 .All
Lithe

After performing a ''Rush Vault action'', break into a sprint of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">150 %</span>''' of your normal Running Movement speed for a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">3 seconds</span>'''.

''Lithe'' causes the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''Lithe'' cannot be used when '''''Exhausted'''''.

After performing a Rush Vault action, break into a sprint of 150 % of your normal Running Movement speed for a maximum of 3 seconds.

Lithe causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.
Lithe cannot be used when Exhausted.

"U mad?" — Feng Min
 Feng
Low Profile

You work best alone.

When it is just you and your pursuer, you know how to disappear.
<p>Whenever you are the only Survivor in the Trial, who is not either in the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, hooked, or already dead, ''Low Profile'' activates:
* '''Suppresses''' your Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and ''Grunts of Pain'' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">90</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You work best alone.

When it is just you and your pursuer, you know how to disappear.

Whenever you are the only Survivor in the Trial, who is not either in the Dying State, hooked, or already dead, Low Profile activates:

  • Suppresses your Pools of Blood, Scratch Marks, and Grunts of Pain for 70/80/90 seconds.
 Ada
Lucky Break

You have had your share of scrapes and bruises, but luck is always on your side.
<p>Whenever you are in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Lucky Break'' activates:
* '''Suppresses''' your Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds''', after which ''Lucky Break'' deactivates.
<p>Each '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 second</span>''' spent healing another Survivor recharges ''Lucky Break'' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 second</span>''' up to its maximum Effect duration.
<p>''Lucky Break'' also deactivates whenever you are Healthy<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or in the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You have had your share of scrapes and bruises, but luck is always on your side.

Whenever you are in the Injured State, Lucky Break activates:

  • Suppresses your Pools of Blood and Scratch Marks for a maximum of 40/50/60 seconds, after which Lucky Break deactivates.

Each 1 second spent healing another Survivor recharges Lucky Break by 1 second up to its maximum Effect duration.

Lucky Break also deactivates whenever you are Healthy or in the Dying State.

"That's not enough to beat me.
Not even close." — Yui Kimura

 Yui
Lucky Star

You know how to stay calm in the face of incomprehensible danger.
<p>While hiding inside a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Lucky Star'' activates:
*'''Suppresses''' your ''Grunts of Pain'' and the creation of Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10 seconds</span>'''

Upon exiting the Locker, you benefit from the following effects for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">10 seconds</span>''':
*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the other Survivors are revealed to you.
*The Aura of the closest Generator is revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.

''Lucky Star'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You know how to stay calm in the face of incomprehensible danger.

While hiding inside a Locker, Lucky Star activates:

  • Suppresses your Grunts of Pain and the creation of Pools of Blood for 10 seconds
Upon exiting the Locker, you benefit from the following effects for 10 seconds:
  • The Auras of the other Survivors are revealed to you.
  • The Aura of the closest Generator is revealed to you in yellow.
Lucky Star has a cool-down of 40/35/30 seconds.

"You are my... lucky star..." — Ellen Ripley

 Ellen
Made for This

You were born to survive, and raised to adapt.
<p>Whenever you are in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Made for This'' activates and you benefit from the following effects:
*Gain a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''&#37;''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' while running.
*Gain the '''''Endurance<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds''' after completing a Healing action on another Survivor.


<p>''Made for This'' cannot be used when suffering from '''''Exhaustion''''', but does not cause the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.

You were born to survive, and raised to adapt.

Whenever you are in the Injured State, Made for This activates and you benefit from the following effects:

  • Gain a 1/2/3 % Haste Status Effect while running.
  • Gain the Endurance Status Effect for 6/8/10 seconds after completing a Healing action on another Survivor.

Made for This cannot be used when suffering from Exhaustion, but does not cause the Exhausted Status Effect.

"I didn't come here to be robot food!" — Gabriel Soma

 Gabriel
Mettle of Man

Evil has a way of always finding you.
<p>After triggering your '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">third</span>''' ''Protection Hit'', ''Mettle of Man'' activates:
* While injured, ''Mettle of Man'' shields you from going down the next time you take damage.
* Healing back to full health will reveal your Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to the Killer whenever you are farther than '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">14</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''metres''' from them.
<p>''Mettle of Man'' deactivates the next time you are put into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
<p>Increases the Odds of becoming the initial '''''Obsession''''' of the Killer by '''+100 %'''.
<p>''The Killer can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

Evil has a way of always finding you.

After triggering your third Protection Hit, Mettle of Man activates:

  • While injured, Mettle of Man shields you from going down the next time you take damage.
  • Healing back to full health will reveal your Aura to the Killer whenever you are farther than 12/14/16 metres from them.

Mettle of Man deactivates the next time you are put into the Dying State.

Increases the Odds of becoming the initial Obsession of the Killer by +100 %.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"Evil has a bullseye on my back the size of Tiger Stadium." — Ash Williams

 Ash
No Mither

Go on out, kid, it is just a scratch.

Your thick blood coagulates practically instantly.

You suffer from the '''''Broken<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the entire Trial, but benefit from the following effects:
* Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are suppressed.
* When injured or dying, ''Grunts of Pain'' are reduced by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">75</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* Your Recovery speed is increased by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* You can recover fully from the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Go on out, kid, it is just a scratch.

Your thick blood coagulates practically instantly.
You suffer from the Broken Status Effect for the entire Trial, but benefit from the following effects:

  • Pools of Blood are suppressed.
  • When injured or dying, Grunts of Pain are reduced by 25/50/75 %.
  • Your Recovery speed is increased by 15/20/25 %.
  • You can recover fully from the Dying State.

"I lost it. Just lamped him one. They went and banned me didn't they. Went t'pub afterwards, had a few pints and moved on to the next chapter. I couldn't be mithered with it all anyway, you know what I mean? Can't be arsed." — David King

 David
No One Left Behind

It is inconceivable to leave someone behind.
<p>Once the Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are powered, ''No One Left Behind'' activates:
* '''Increases''' your Unhooking and Healing speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* Grants '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">75</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">100</span>''' '''&#37;''' bonus Bloodpoints<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for actions in the Altruism<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> Category.
* Grants the unhooked Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">7 %</span>''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">10 seconds</span>'''.
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all other Survivors are revealed to you.

It is inconceivable to leave someone behind.

Once the Exit Gates are powered, No One Left Behind activates:

  • Increases your Unhooking and Healing speed by 30/40/50 %.
  • Grants 50/75/100 % bonus Bloodpoints for actions in the Altruism Category.
  • Grants the unhooked Survivor a 7 % Haste Status Effect for 10 seconds.
  • The Auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you.

"Yeah, no shit.
But I believe we can outsmart and overthrow him if we work together.
Don't be predictable and selfish!" — Clyde, The Lost Tapes

 .All
Object of Obsession

A supernatural bond links you to the Killer.
<p>Whenever the Killer reads your Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''Object of Obsession'' activates for the same duration as their Aura-reading action:
*'''Reveals''' the Killer's Aura to you.
*'''Increases''' your Action speeds in Repairing, Healing, and Cleansing by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

Whenever you are the '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', your Aura is automatically revealed to the Killer for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 seconds</span>''' every '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.
<p>Increases the Odds of becoming the initial '''''Obsession''''' of the Killer by '''+100 %'''.

''The Killer can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

A supernatural bond links you to the Killer.

Whenever the Killer reads your AuraObject of Obsession activates for the same duration as their Aura-reading action:

  • Reveals the Killer's Aura to you.
  • Increases your Action speeds in Repairing, Healing, and Cleansing by 2/4/6 %.
Whenever you are the Obsession, your Aura is automatically revealed to the Killer for 3 seconds every 30 seconds.

Increases the Odds of becoming the initial Obsession of the Killer by +100 %.
The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"He was watching me!" — Laurie Strode

 Laurie
Off the Record

You have learnt that a quiet approach is sometimes best.
<p>After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, ''Off the Record'' activates for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">80</span>''' '''seconds''':
*'''Prevents''' your Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> from being revealed to the Killer<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, if they attempt to read it.
*'''Suppresses '''''Grunts of Pain'' when injured.
*Grants the '''''Endurance<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
**This effect is cancelled prematurely if you perform a ''Conspicuous Action''.


<p>''Off the Record'' deactivates once the Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are powered.

You have learnt that a quiet approach is sometimes best.

After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, Off the Record activates for the next 60/70/80 seconds:

  • Prevents your Aura from being revealed to the Killer, if they attempt to read it.
  • Suppresses Grunts of Pain when injured.
  • Grants the Endurance Status Effect.
    • This effect is cancelled prematurely if you perform a Conspicuous Action.

Off the Record deactivates once the Exit Gates are powered.

Open-Handed

Strengthens the potential in your and your team's Aura-reading abilities.
* '''Increases''' the radius of all Aura-reading abilities emanating from yourself or other Survivors by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''metres'''.
<p>Survivors can only be affected by one instance of ''Open-Handed'' at a time.

Strengthens the potential in your and your team's Aura-reading abilities.
  • Increases the radius of all Aura-reading abilities emanating from yourself or other Survivors by 8/12/16 metres.

Survivors can only be affected by one instance of Open-Handed at a time.

Overcome

You have calculated how much energy you can risk to expend.
*Whenever you become injured, you retain the Movement Speed burst for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2 additional seconds</span>'''.

''Overcome'' causes the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''Overcome'' cannot be used when '''''Exhausted'''''.

You have calculated how much energy you can risk to expend.
  • Whenever you become injured, you retain the Movement Speed burst for 2 additional seconds.

Overcome causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.
Overcome cannot be used when Exhausted.

Overzealous

Fighting back against the Ravage motivates and inspires you.
<p>After cleansing or blessing a Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Overzealous'' activates:
*'''Increases''' your Repair speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''&#37;''' if it was a '''Dull Totem'''.
*'''Increases''' your Repair speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''&#37;''' if it was a '''Hex Totem'''.

''Overzealous'' deactivates when losing a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means.

Fighting back against the Ravage motivates and inspires you.

After cleansing or blessing a Totem, Overzealous activates:

  • Increases your Repair speed by 8/9/10 % if it was a Dull Totem.
  • Increases your Repair speed by 16/18/20 % if it was a Hex Totem.
Overzealous deactivates when losing a Health State by any means.

"The Ravage senses us. We need to work fast." — Haddie Kaur, Ravages of the Abyss Episode 9

 Haddie
Parental Guidance

You have inherited the ability to hear the dead — and now the dead warn you of danger.
*After stunning the Killer by any means, ''Parental Guidance'' suppresses your Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and ''Grunts of Pain'' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">7</span>''' '''seconds'''.


You have inherited the ability to hear the dead — and now the dead warn you of danger.
  • After stunning the Killer by any means, Parental Guidance suppresses your Scratch Marks, Pools of Blood, and Grunts of Pain for the next 5/6/7 seconds.
 Yoichi
Pharmacy

You have a knack for finding medicine.
<p>Whenever you are in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Pharmacy'' activates:
* '''Increases''' the Unlocking speed of Chests<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">80</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* '''Reduces''' the Hearing range of noises related to Unlocking by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">-8 metres</span>'''.
* '''Guarantees''' an [[Emergency Med-Kit]]<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> when unlocking a Chest<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You have a knack for finding medicine.

Whenever you are in the Injured State, Pharmacy activates:

  • Increases the Unlocking speed of Chests by 40/60/80 %.
  • Reduces the Hearing range of noises related to Unlocking by -8 metres.
  • Guarantees an Emergency Med-Kit when unlocking a Chest.

"Adrenaline, it is going to keep us awake. I stole it from one of the Nurse's carts." — Quentin Smith

 Quentin
Plot Twist

Big moments are vital, but you know that sometimes an understated read can be just as powerful.
<p>Whenever you are in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Plot Twist'' activates:
*While crouching and motionless, press the ''Active Ability button'' to silently enter the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> with the following benefits:
**'''Suppresses''' ''Grunts of Pain''.
**'''Suppresses''' Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
**'''Grants''' the ability to fully recover from the Dying State.
*After full recovery using ''Plot Twist'', you are healed instantly and gain a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">+50 %</span>''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''seconds'''.


<p>''Plot Twist'' deactivates after recovering yourself by any means.
<p>''Plot Twist'' reactivates once more when the Exit Gates become powered.

Big moments are vital, but you know that sometimes an understated read can be just as powerful.

Whenever you are in the Injured State, Plot Twist activates:

  • While crouching and motionless, press the Active Ability button to silently enter the Dying State with the following benefits:
    • Suppresses Grunts of Pain.
    • Suppresses Pools of Blood.
    • Grants the ability to fully recover from the Dying State.
  • After full recovery using Plot Twist, you are healed instantly and gain a +50 % Haste Status Effect for 2/3/4 seconds.

Plot Twist deactivates after recovering yourself by any means.

Plot Twist reactivates once more when the Exit Gates become powered.

"I think you'll find this shooting location... captivating." — Pauline Stamper

 Nicolas
Plunderer's Instinct

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of closed Chests<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and dropped Items<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> in the environment within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">32</span>''' '''metres''' of your location are revealed to you.
* Grants a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">considerably</span>''' better chance at finding an Item of a higher Rarity from Chests.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
  • The Auras of closed Chests and dropped Items in the environment within 16/24/32 metres of your location are revealed to you.
  • Grants a considerably better chance at finding an Item of a higher Rarity from Chests.

"The pioneers used to loot these babies for hours." — Aizeyu, The Lost Tapes

 .All
Poised

Achieving goals boosts your confidence.

After a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is completed, you will not leave any Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Achieving goals boosts your confidence.

After a Generator is completed, you will not leave any Scratch Marks for the next 6/8/10 seconds.

"Ok, stay calm. Don't overthink it and just keep moving forward: you got this." — Jane Romero
 Jane
Potential Energy

Your arcane abilities have adapted to The Entity's Realm after centuries of wandering, granting you unprecedented control over its many devices.
<p>After repairing Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for a total of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''uninterrupted seconds''', press the ''Active Ability button'' to activate ''Potential Energy'':
*Continuing to repair the Generator will charge ''Potential Energy'' instead of progressing the Generator.
*'''Converts''' '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1.5 %</span>''' of Repair progression into '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20 Tokens</span>'''.
*Missing Skill Checks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> results in losing some Tokens.


<p>While ''Potential Energy'' has at least '''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">1 Token</span>''', press the ''Active Ability button'' while repairing a Generator to instantly progress it by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr10" style="color: #0e98ff;">1 % per Token</span>''', consuming all remaining Tokens and deactivating ''Potential Energy''.
<p>''Potential Energy'' loses all Tokens and deactivates upon losing a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Your arcane abilities have adapted to The Entity's Realm after centuries of wandering, granting you unprecedented control over its many devices.

After repairing Generators for a total of 12/10/8 uninterrupted seconds, press the Active Ability button to activate Potential Energy:

  • Continuing to repair the Generator will charge Potential Energy instead of progressing the Generator.
  • Converts 1.5 % of Repair progression into 1 Token, up to a maximum of 20 Tokens.
  • Missing Skill Checks results in losing some Tokens.

While Potential Energy has at least 1 Token, press the Active Ability button while repairing a Generator to instantly progress it by 1 % per Token, consuming all remaining Tokens and deactivating Potential Energy.

Potential Energy loses all Tokens and deactivates upon losing a Health State.

"When you look a layer deeper, you realise... everything is connected." — Vittorio Toscano

 Vittorio
Power Struggle

You have never given up and you are not about to start now.
<p>
* Reveals the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of available Pallets<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> whenever you are in the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
<p>While being carried by The Killer, reaching '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">15</span>''' '''&#37;''' Wiggling progression activates ''Power Struggle'':
* You can drop a nearby, standing Pallet to stun the Killer and escape their grasp.
<p>''Power Struggle'' deactivates after triggering successfully.

You have never given up and you are not about to start now.

  • Reveals the Auras of available Pallets whenever you are in the Dying State.

While being carried by The Killer, reaching 25/20/15 % Wiggling progression activates Power Struggle:

  • You can drop a nearby, standing Pallet to stun the Killer and escape their grasp.

Power Struggle deactivates after triggering successfully.

"I relied on others to protect me once and I lost everything. Never again." — Élodie Rakoto

You have the undeniable capability to sense danger.
* Receive an auditory warning upon looking in the Killer's direction within a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">45 °</span>''' cone within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">36 metres</span>'''.
<p>''Premonition'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">45</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''' each time it activates.

You have the undeniable capability to sense danger.
  • Receive an auditory warning upon looking in the Killer's direction within a 45 ° cone within 36 metres.

Premonition has a cool-down of 60/45/30 seconds each time it activates.

Prove Thyself

'''Increases''' your Repair speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''&#37;''' for each Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 metres</span>''' of your location other than yourself, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* This effect is also extended to all other Survivors within that range.
<p>Survivors can only be affected by one instance of ''Prove Thyself'' at a time.

Increases your Repair speed by 6/8/10 % for each Survivor within 4 metres of your location other than yourself, up to a maximum of 18/24/30 %.
  • This effect is also extended to all other Survivors within that range.

Survivors can only be affected by one instance of Prove Thyself at a time.

Quick & Quiet

You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in Lockers.
* '''Suppresses''' both the ''Loud Noise Notification'' and the sound effects triggered by rushing to vault Windows<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Pallets<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, or rushing to enter or exit Lockers<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in Lockers.
  • Suppresses both the Loud Noise Notification and the sound effects triggered by rushing to vault Windows, Pallets, or rushing to enter or exit Lockers.

Quick & Quiet has a cool-down of 30/25/20 seconds.

Quick Gambit

When you have the Killer's attention, you know how to keep it; others can be confident they will not be interrupted any time soon.
* '''Increases''' the Repair speed of any other Survivor by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''&#37;''', while you are being chased within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24 metres</span>''' of the Generator they are currently repairing.

When you have the Killer's attention, you know how to keep it; others can be confident they will not be interrupted any time soon.
