Reactive Healing

The more the situation becomes compromised, the more determined you become to complete the operation.
<p>When another Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32 metres</span>''' of your location while you are in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, you benefit from the following effect:
* Grants '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">45</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;''' of your missing Healing Progression to your Health Bar.

The more the situation becomes compromised, the more determined you become to complete the operation.

When another Survivor loses a Health State within 32 metres of your location while you are in the Injured State, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Grants 40/45/50 % of your missing Healing Progression to your Health Bar.
 Ada
Reassurance

Your presence helps allies focus, assuaging the panic associated with extreme conditions.
*When within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6 metres</span>''' of a hooked Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, press the ''Active Ability button'' to halt their ''Sacrifice Process'' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.
**If the hooked Survivor has already entered the ''Struggle Phase'', its Skill Checks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are paused for that duration.

''Reassurance'' can only be used once per Survivor per Hook Instance.

Your presence helps allies focus, assuaging the panic associated with extreme conditions.
  • When within 6 metres of a hooked Survivor, press the Active Ability button to halt their Sacrifice Process for the next 20/25/30 seconds.
    • If the hooked Survivor has already entered the Struggle Phase, its Skill Checks are paused for that duration.
Reassurance can only be used once per Survivor per Hook Instance.
 Rebecca
Red Herring

You have noticed that people pay attention to whatever makes the loudest noise.

After repairing a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for at least '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 seconds</span>''', its Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is highlighted to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.
* The Generator stays highlighted until it is either fully repaired, you start repairing another Generator, or enter a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
* Entering a Locker will trigger a ''Loud Noise Notification'' for the Killer at the highlighted Generator's location.
<p>''Red Herring'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You have noticed that people pay attention to whatever makes the loudest noise.

After repairing a Generator for at least 3 seconds, its Aura is highlighted to you in yellow.

  • The Generator stays highlighted until it is either fully repaired, you start repairing another Generator, or enter a Locker.
  • Entering a Locker will trigger a Loud Noise Notification for the Killer at the highlighted Generator's location.

Red Herring has a cool-down of 60/50/40 seconds.
"The news edit out what is burdensome and complex. which is the truth." — Zarina Kassir

 Zarina
Renewal

When you heal another Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for the equivalent of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>''' Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Renewal'' activates:
*The next time you are unhooked or unhook yourself, you suffer from the '''''Broken<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' until ''Renewal'' deactivates.
*You are automatically healed '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 Health State</span>''' after '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''seconds'''.

While ''Renewal'' is active, the following conditions will deactivate it:
*Successfully being healed by ''Renewal''.
*Being put into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> before the timer elapses.

''Renewal'' does not activate if you already suffer from the '''''Broken''''' '''Status Effect'''.

When you heal another Survivor for the equivalent of 1 Health State, Renewal activates:
  • The next time you are unhooked or unhook yourself, you suffer from the Broken Status Effect until Renewal deactivates.
  • You are automatically healed 1 Health State after 28/24/20 seconds.

While Renewal is active, the following conditions will deactivate it:

  • Successfully being healed by Renewal.
  • Being put into the Dying State before the timer elapses.
Renewal does not activate if you already suffer from the Broken Status Effect.
 .All
Repressed Alliance

You are accustomed to being hunted by malicious forces, and you have begun using it to your advantage.
<p>After repairing Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for a total of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">55</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">45</span>''' '''seconds''', ''Repressed Alliance'' activates:
* Press the ''Active Ability button'' to call upon The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to block the Generator you are currently repairing for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>''', after which ''Repressed Alliance'' deactivates.
* The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the blocked Generator is revealed to all Survivors in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
<p>''Repressed Alliance'' can only be triggered when no other Survivors are repairing your Generator.

You are accustomed to being hunted by malicious forces, and you have begun using it to your advantage.

After repairing Generators for a total of 55/50/45 seconds, Repressed Alliance activates:

  • Press the Active Ability button to call upon The Entity to block the Generator you are currently repairing for 30 seconds, after which Repressed Alliance deactivates.
  • The Aura of the blocked Generator is revealed to all Survivors in white.

Repressed Alliance can only be triggered when no other Survivors are repairing your Generator.

 Cheryl
Residual Manifest

A lifetime of chasing the darkness has taught you that the best disinfectant is light.
*After a successful ''Killer Blind'', the Killer suffers from the '''''Blindness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*''Residual Manifest'' grants the ability to rummage through an opened Chest<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> once per Trial and will guarantee a basic Flashlight<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

A lifetime of chasing the darkness has taught you that the best disinfectant is light.
  • After a successful Killer Blind, the Killer suffers from the Blindness Status Effect for 20/25/30 seconds.
  • Residual Manifest grants the ability to rummage through an opened Chest once per Trial and will guarantee a basic Flashlight.
"I'll never see what Haddie sees. But so long as I'm with her, I know I'm safe." — Jordan Rois, Ravages of the Abyss Episode 5

Resilience

You are motivated in dire situations.
* '''Increases''' your Action speeds in Repairing, Healing, Sabotaging, Unhooking, Vaulting, Cleansing, Blessing, Opening, and Unlocking by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">9</span>''' '''&#37;''' when in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You are motivated in dire situations.
  • Increases your Action speeds in Repairing, Healing, Sabotaging, Unhooking, Vaulting, Cleansing, Blessing, Opening, and Unlocking by 3/6/9 % when in the Injured State.

"Focus, even in these desperate times."

You have come back from near impossible odds... and you will do it again.

After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, instantly gain '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">45</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;''' to your Healing progress.

You have come back from near impossible odds... and you will do it again.

After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, instantly gain 40/45/50 % to your Healing progress.

Rookie Spirit

You keep a careful eye on objectives when they are slipping away.
<p>While repairing Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, succeed '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' Good or Great Skill Checks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to activate ''Rookie Spirit'' for the remainder of the Trial:
*Once active, the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of any regressing Generators are revealed to you.

You keep a careful eye on objectives when they are slipping away.

While repairing Generators, succeed 5/4/3 Good or Great Skill Checks to activate Rookie Spirit for the remainder of the Trial:

  • Once active, the Auras of any regressing Generators are revealed to you.

 Leon
Saboteur

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
<p>For the duration of the Killer<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> carrying another Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, you see the Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of every Hook<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">56 metres</span>''' of the carried Survivor's pick-up location:
*The Auras of regular Hooks are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
*The Auras of '''Scourge Hooks''' are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.


<p>Unlocks the ability to sabotage Hooks without needing a Toolboxes|Toolbox<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>:
*Sabotaging a Hook without a Toolbox takes '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">2.3 seconds</span>'''.
*That Sabotage action has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">65</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.


Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:

For the duration of the Killer carrying another Survivor, you see the Aura of every Hook within 56 metres of the carried Survivor's pick-up location:

  • The Auras of regular Hooks are revealed to you in white.
  • The Auras of Scourge Hooks are revealed to you in yellow.

Unlocks the ability to sabotage Hooks without needing a Toolbox:

  • Sabotaging a Hook without a Toolbox takes 2.3 seconds.
  • That Sabotage action has a cool-down of 70/65/60 seconds.
 Jake
Scavenger

Where others see junk, you see valuable improvised tools.
<p>While holding a depleted ''Toolbox'', ''Scavenger'' activates:
*Succeeding at ''Great Repairing Skill Checks'' grants '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">5 Tokens</span>'''.
*Reaching the maximum number of Tokens automatically consumes them and fully recharges the ''Toolbox''.
*Recharging a ''Toolbox'' will reduce your Repair speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">-50 %</span>''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.


<p>''Scavenger'' grants the ability to rummage through an opened Chest<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> once per Trial and will guarantee a basic Toolbox<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Where others see junk, you see valuable improvised tools.

While holding a depleted Toolbox, Scavenger activates:

  • Succeeding at Great Repairing Skill Checks grants 1 Token, up to a maximum of 5 Tokens.
  • Reaching the maximum number of Tokens automatically consumes them and fully recharges the Toolbox.
  • Recharging a Toolbox will reduce your Repair speed by -50 % for the next 40/35/30 seconds.

Scavenger grants the ability to rummage through an opened Chest once per Trial and will guarantee a basic Toolbox.

"It's amazing what people will throw away around here." — Gabriel Soma

 Gabriel
Scene Partner

You lock in with your co-star, engaging with and reacting to each other on a higher level.
<p>Whenever you are inside the Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Scene Partner'' activates:
*Looking at the Killer causes you to scream, which reveals their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*There is a chance of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">50 %</span>''' that you will scream again, extending the Aura-reveal duration by another '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">2 seconds</span>'''.


<p>''Scene Partner'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">60 seconds</span>'''.

You lock in with your co-star, engaging with and reacting to each other on a higher level.

Whenever you are inside the Terror Radius, Scene Partner activates:

  • Looking at the Killer causes you to scream, which reveals their Aura for 3/4/5 seconds.
  • There is a chance of 50 % that you will scream again, extending the Aura-reveal duration by another 2 seconds.

Scene Partner has a cool-down of 60 seconds.

"This is not in the script!" — Nicolas Cage

Self-Aware

You know your weaknesses and refuse to hide from them.

*Unlocks the ability to see your own Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

  • Increases your Walking speed by 10/15/20 %.

Self-Care


*Unlocks the ''Self-Care'' ability, allowing you to self-heal without needing a [[Med-Kit]]<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> at '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">35</span>''' '''&#37;''' of the normal Healing speed.

Self-Preservation

Life is unforgiving.

The more confirmation you get of that, the more prepared you become.

Whenever another Survivor is hit with a ''Basic Attack'' or ''Special Attack'' within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16 metres</span>''' of you, ''Self-Preservation'' activates:
* Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Grunts of Pain'' when injured, and Bleeding<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are suppressed for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Life is unforgiving.

The more confirmation you get of that, the more prepared you become.
Whenever another Survivor is hit with a Basic Attack or Special Attack within 16 metres of you, Self-Preservation activates:

  • Scratch Marks, Grunts of Pain when injured, and Bleeding are suppressed for the next 6/8/10 seconds.

"Something I learnt in the industry: when the axe is swinging, keep your head down." — Yun-Jin Lee

 Yun-Jin
Situational Awareness

You are aware of your surroundings and share the information with others.
*While repairing a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, its Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is revealed in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>''' to all other Survivors located within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32 metres</span>'''.
*If the Killer<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> downs a Survivor while you are repairing a Generator, you see the Auras of all other Survivors for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.


You are aware of your surroundings and share the information with others.
  • While repairing a Generator, its Aura is revealed in yellow to all other Survivors located within 32 metres.
  • If the Killer downs a Survivor while you are repairing a Generator, you see the Auras of all other Survivors for 8/9/10 seconds.

Small Game

You have the undeniable capability to sense danger.
* Receive an auditory warning upon looking in the direction of Totems in a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">45 °</span>''' cone within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">12</span>''' '''metres'''.
<p>''Small Game'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">14</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds''' each time it activates.
<p>For each Dull or Hex Totem cleansed by any Player, ''Small Game'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 Token</span>''':
* Each Token decreases the Detection cone's angle by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">5 °</span>''', down to a minimum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20 °</span>'''.

You have the undeniable capability to sense danger.
  • Receive an auditory warning upon looking in the direction of Totems in a 45 ° cone within 8/10/12 metres.

Small Game has a cool-down of 14/12/10 seconds each time it activates.

For each Dull or Hex Totem cleansed by any Player, Small Game gains 1 Token:

  • Each Token decreases the Detection cone's angle by 5 °, down to a minimum of 20 °.

 .All
Smash Hit

When your rival makes a mistake, you seize the opportunity.
<p>After stunning the Killer with a Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, break into a sprint at '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">150 %</span>''' of your normal Running Movement speed for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Smash Hit'' causes the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Smash Hit'' cannot be used when '''''Exhausted'''''.

When your rival makes a mistake, you seize the opportunity.

After stunning the Killer with a Pallet, break into a sprint at 150 % of your normal Running Movement speed for 4 seconds.

Smash Hit causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 30/25/20 seconds.

Smash Hit cannot be used when Exhausted.

"I have dealt with psychopaths in suits. You're just uglier and worse dressed." — Yun-Jin Lee

 Yun-Jin
Sole Survivor

As more of your friends fall to the Killer, you become shrouded in isolation and the Killer's Aura-reading abilities towards you are disrupted.
<p>Each time a Survivor other than yourself is killed or sacrificed, ''Sole Survivor'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">3 Tokens</span>''':
*Grants a stack-able radius of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">22</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">24</span>''' '''metres''' per Token around you, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">66</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">72</span>''' '''metres''', within which you are immune to the Killer's Aura-reading abilities.

When you are the Last Survivor Standing, you benefit from the following effects:
*'''Increases''' your Repair speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">+75 %</span>'''.
*'''Increases''' your Gate and Hatch Opening speeds by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">+50 %</span>'''.

Increases the Odds of becoming the initial '''''Obsession''''' of the Killer by '''+100 %'''.
<p>''The Killer can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

As more of your friends fall to the Killer, you become shrouded in isolation and the Killer's Aura-reading abilities towards you are disrupted.

Each time a Survivor other than yourself is killed or sacrificed, Sole Survivor gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 3 Tokens:

  • Grants a stack-able radius of 20/22/24 metres per Token around you, up to a maximum of 60/66/72 metres, within which you are immune to the Killer's Aura-reading abilities.
When you are the Last Survivor Standing, you benefit from the following effects:
  • Increases your Repair speed by +75 %.
  • Increases your Gate and Hatch Opening speeds by +50 %.
Increases the Odds of becoming the initial Obsession of the Killer by +100 %.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"It was the boogeyman." — Laurie Strode

 Laurie
Solidarity

Sharing painful experiences has the power to heal.
<p>While injured and healing another Survivor without using a [[Med-Kit]]<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, you benefit from the following effect:
*Passively heal yourself at a rate of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">45</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;''' of your Altruistic Healing speed.


Sharing painful experiences has the power to heal.

While injured and healing another Survivor without using a Med-Kit, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Passively heal yourself at a rate of 40/45/50 % of your Altruistic Healing speed.

"Showing up when things get rough, listening to people's problems, and supporting those in need; that's how you become stronger, that's how you grow." — Jane Romero

 Jane
Soul Guard

You have been through immense hardship and you're stronger for it.

After being healed from or having recovered from the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Soul Guard'' grants you the '''''Endurance<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* Any damage taken that would put you into the Dying State will instead trigger the '''''Deep Wound<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''', after which you have '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20 seconds</span>''' to Mend yourself.
* Taking any damage while under the effect of '''''Deep Wound''''' or if its timer runs out will put you into the Dying State.
<p>''Soul Guard'' allows you to completely recover from the Dying State when you are affected by the '''''Cursed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.

''Soul Guard'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.

You have been through immense hardship and you're stronger for it.

After being healed from or having recovered from the Dying State, Soul Guard grants you the Endurance Status Effect for the next 4/6/8 seconds.

  • Any damage taken that would put you into the Dying State will instead trigger the Deep Wound Status Effect, after which you have 20 seconds to Mend yourself.
  • Taking any damage while under the effect of Deep Wound or if its timer runs out will put you into the Dying State.

Soul Guard allows you to completely recover from the Dying State when you are affected by the Cursed Status Effect.
Soul Guard has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

 Cheryl
Spine Chill

An unnatural tingle warns you of impending doom.
<p>Whenever the Killer<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">36 metres</span>''' of your location and looking at you with a clear line of sight, ''Spine Chill'' activates:
*'''Increases''' your Action speeds in Repairing, Healing, Sabotaging, Unhooking, Cleansing, Blessing, Opening, and Unlocking by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
**This effect lingers for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">0.5 seconds</span>''' after the Killer loses line of sight or exits the range.

An unnatural tingle warns you of impending doom.

Whenever the Killer is within 36 metres of your location and looking at you with a clear line of sight, Spine Chill activates:

  • Increases your Action speeds in Repairing, Healing, Sabotaging, Unhooking, Cleansing, Blessing, Opening, and Unlocking by 2/4/6 %.
    • This effect lingers for 0.5 seconds after the Killer loses line of sight or exits the range.
"There is a voice that doesn't use words. Listen.." — Sassy, The Lost Tapes
 .All
Sprint Burst


* When starting to run, break into a sprint at '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">150 %</span>''' of your normal Running Movement speed for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">3 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Sprint Burst'' causes the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''Sprint Burst'' cannot be used when '''''Exhausted'''''.

  • When starting to run, break into a sprint at 150 % of your normal Running Movement speed for 3 seconds.

Sprint Burst causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.
Sprint Burst cannot be used when Exhausted.

"See you if you can catch up..." — Meg Thomas

 Meg
Stake Out

Getting close to the Killer fills you with determination.

Every '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15 seconds</span>''' you are within the Killer's Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, while not being chased, ''Stake Out'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''Tokens'''.
* When ''Stake Out'' has at least '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">1 Token</span>''', Good Skill Checks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> consume '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">1 Token</span>''' and are considered Great Skill Checks, granting an additional Progression bonus of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">+1 %</span>'''.
* Great Skill Checks do not consume any Tokens.

Getting close to the Killer fills you with determination.

Every 15 seconds you are within the Killer's Terror Radius, while not being chased, Stake Out gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 2/3/4 Tokens.

  • When Stake Out has at least 1 Token, Good Skill Checks consume 1 Token and are considered Great Skill Checks, granting an additional Progression bonus of +1 %.
  • Great Skill Checks do not consume any Tokens.

"I had you, I had you on your knees. You're runnin' scared because we had you. We're gonna close this case!" — Detective David Tapp

 David
Streetwise

Long nights out taught you to do a lot with what you have got.
* '''Increases''' the Efficiency of your Items<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
<p>''Streetwise'' extends its effect to all other Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8 metres</span>''' of your location and lingers for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">15 seconds</span>'''.

Long nights out taught you to do a lot with what you have got.
  • Increases the Efficiency of your Items by 15/20/25 %.

Streetwise extends its effect to all other Survivors within 8 metres of your location and lingers for 15 seconds.

"You are doing it wrong! Let me show you how it is done." — Nea Karlsson

 Nea
Teamwork: Collective Stealth

When someone helps you out, you respond in kind.
<p>Whenever another Survivor finishes healing you, ''Teamwork: Collective Stealth'' activates, and both you and the Survivor who healed you benefit from the following effect:
*'''Suppresses''' your Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for as long as you stay within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">12 metres</span>''' of one another or one of you loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.


<p>''Teamwork: Collective Stealth'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">180</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">160</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">140</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>Survivors can only be affected by one instance of ''Teamwork: Collective Stealth'' at a time.

When someone helps you out, you respond in kind.

Whenever another Survivor finishes healing you, Teamwork: Collective Stealth activates, and both you and the Survivor who healed you benefit from the following effect:

  • Suppresses your Scratch Marks for as long as you stay within 12 metres of one another or one of you loses a Health State.

Teamwork: Collective Stealth has a cool-down of 180/160/140 seconds.

Survivors can only be affected by one instance of Teamwork: Collective Stealth at a time.

"I'm good, I'm good... but keep it down." — Renato Lyra

 Renato
Teamwork: Power of Two

It is hard to keep up with you, but it does not stop people from trying.
<p>Whenever you finish healing another Survivor, ''Teamwork: Power of Two'' activates, and both you and the healed Survivor benefit from the following effect:
*Grants a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5 %</span>''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for as long as you stay within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">12 metres</span>''' of one another or one of you loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.


<p>''Teamwork: Power of Two'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">180</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">160</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">140</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>Survivors can only be affected by one instance of ''Teamwork: Power of Two'' at a time.

It is hard to keep up with you, but it does not stop people from trying.

Whenever you finish healing another Survivor, Teamwork: Power of Two activates, and both you and the healed Survivor benefit from the following effect:

  • Grants a 5 % Haste Status Effect for as long as you stay within 12 metres of one another or one of you loses a Health State.

Teamwork: Power of Two has a cool-down of 180/160/140 seconds.

Survivors can only be affected by one instance of Teamwork: Power of Two at a time.

"You good? Then keep up!" — Thalita Lyra

 Thalita
Technician

You are apt at handling machinery with the greatest care and precision.
<p>When repairing a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, the following effects apply:
*'''Reduces''' the audible range of your Repair noises by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">-8 metres</span>'''.
*'''Suppresses''' the explosion and accompanying ''Loud Noise Notification'' when failing a Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
*Failing a Skill Check '''instantly regresses''' the Generator by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''&#37;''' of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.

You are apt at handling machinery with the greatest care and precision.

When repairing a Generator, the following effects apply:

  • Reduces the audible range of your Repair noises by -8 metres.
  • Suppresses the explosion and accompanying Loud Noise Notification when failing a Skill Check.
  • Failing a Skill Check instantly regresses the Generator by 5/4/3 % of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.
"I am gonna stealth this one." — Feng Min
 Feng
Tenacity

There is nothing stopping you.
<p>Your ferocious tenacity in dire situations allow you to benefit from the following effects:
* '''Increases''' your Crawling speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* Grants the ability to crawl and recover at the same time.
* '''Reduces''' the volume of ''Grunts of Pain'' while in the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">-75 %</span>'''.

There is nothing stopping you.

Your ferocious tenacity in dire situations allow you to benefit from the following effects:

  • Increases your Crawling speed by 30/40/50 %.
  • Grants the ability to crawl and recover at the same time.
  • Reduces the volume of Grunts of Pain while in the Dying State by -75 %.

"What the hell is this? I'm taking this bastard down!" — Detective David Tapp

This Is Not Happening

You perform at your best when you are under extreme stress.
* '''Increases''' the Success zone of Great Skill Checks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while Repairing and Healing by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;''' when in the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You perform at your best when you are under extreme stress.
  • Increases the Success zone of Great Skill Checks while Repairing and Healing by 10/20/30 % when in the Injured State.
 .All
Troubleshooter

No amount of distraction will shake you from your primary task.
<p>When you are chased by the Killer, ''Troubleshooter'' activates:
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> with the most progress is revealed to you.
*The Aura of the Killer is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''seconds''' after dropping a Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.


<p>These effects linger for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds''' after ending the Chase, after which ''Troubleshooter'' deactivates.

No amount of distraction will shake you from your primary task.

When you are chased by the Killer, Troubleshooter activates:

  • The Aura of the Generator with the most progress is revealed to you.
  • The Aura of the Killer is revealed to you for 4/5/6 seconds after dropping a Pallet.

These effects linger for 6/8/10 seconds after ending the Chase, after which Troubleshooter deactivates.

"Nothing gets done around here if I don't do it." — Gabriel Soma

Past battles have taught you a thing or two about survival.

Up the Ante

All will be well in the end; you just know it.

Your confidence strengthens the feeling of hope for those around you.

For Each Survivor still in the Trial, ''Up the Ante'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>'''.
* Each Token applies a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''&#37;''' bonus to the Luck<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">9</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

All will be well in the end; you just know it.

Your confidence strengthens the feeling of hope for those around you.
For Each Survivor still in the Trial, Up the Ante gains 1 Token.

  • Each Token applies a stack-able 1/2/3 % bonus to the Luck of all Survivors, up to a maximum of 3/6/9 %.

class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', '''''Hindered<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', and '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects''' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* This effect also applies to all other Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8 metres</span>''' of your location and lingers for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">15 seconds</span>'''.

You look over your friends even in dire situations.

  • Increases your Recovery rate from the Blindness, Broken, Exhaustion, Exposed, Haemorrhage, Hindered, and Oblivious Status Effects by 20/25/30 %.
  • This effect also applies to all other Survivors within 8 metres of your location and lingers for 15 seconds.

"I am gonna be here when you wake up. You are gonna make it." — Quentin Smith

 Quentin
Visionary

You are remarkably focused on your means of escape.
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are revealed to you within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32 metres</span>'''.
* Each time a Generator is completed, ''Visionary'' is deactivated for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You are remarkably focused on your means of escape.
  • The Auras of Generators are revealed to you within 32 metres.
  • Each time a Generator is completed, Visionary is deactivated for 20/18/16 seconds.
 Felix
Wake Up!

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
<p>Once all Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are completed, ''Wake Up!'' activates:
*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the Exit Gate Switches<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are revealed to you within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">128 metres</span>'''.
*Your Aura is revealed to all other Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">128 metres</span>''' of your location while opening an Exit Gate<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
*'''Increases''' your Gate Opening speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''&#37;'''.


Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

Once all Generators are completed, Wake Up! activates:

  • The Auras of the Exit Gate Switches are revealed to you within 128 metres.
  • Your Aura is revealed to all other Survivors within 128 metres of your location while opening an Exit Gate.
  • Increases your Gate Opening speed by 15/20/25 %.

"Ok, look. If we survive the next 24 hours, then I'll take you out on a real date." — Quentin Smith

 Quentin
We'll Make It

Helping others heightens your morale.
* '''Increases''' your Altruistic Healing speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">100 %</span>''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">90</span>''' '''seconds''' whenever you rescue another Survivor from a Hook<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>

Helping others heightens your morale.
  • Increases your Altruistic Healing speed by 100 % for the next 30/60/90 seconds whenever you rescue another Survivor from a Hook

"I am confident we can all escape in one piece if we help each other."

 .All
We're Gonna Live Forever

Your few friends deserve the best protection.
* '''Increases''' your Healing speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">100 %</span>''' when healing a dying Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
<p>When performing any of the following actions, ''We're Gonna Live Forever'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 Token</span>''':
*Performing a Safe Hook Rescue
*Taking a ''Protection Hit'' for an injured Survivor.
*Stunning or Blinding the Killer to rescue a carried Survivor


<p>Consume '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">1 Token</span>''' to grant the '''''Endurance<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds''' to any Survivor healed from the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>

Your few friends deserve the best protection.
  • Increases your Healing speed by 100 % when healing a dying Survivor.

When performing any of the following actions, We're Gonna Live Forever gains 1 Token:

  • Performing a Safe Hook Rescue
  • Taking a Protection Hit for an injured Survivor.
  • Stunning or Blinding the Killer to rescue a carried Survivor

Consume 1 Token to grant the Endurance Status Effect for 6/8/10 seconds to any Survivor healed from the Dying State

"Come on then, let's ave' it! I don't give a shit pal." — David King

 David
Windows of Opportunity

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
<p>The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Breakable Walls<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Pallets<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and Windows<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are revealed to you within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">32</span>''' '''metres'''.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

The Auras of Breakable Walls, Pallets, and Windows are revealed to you within 24/28/32 metres.

"Rise and shine, work hard, carve out your name,
Take aim, pull the trigger, hit the bulls eye for fame,
Know the value of faith, an' family, and don't you complain,
Open wide, your windows of opportunity" — Kate Denson's "Windows of Opportunity"

 Kate
Wiretap

You know that the best way to stay one step ahead is to keep tabs on the competition.
<p>After repairing Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for a total of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">50 %</span>''', ''Wiretap'' activates:
*After continuing to repair any Generator for another '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">3 seconds</span>''', you can press the ''Active Ability button'' to install a '''Wiretap''', which stays active for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">110</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">120</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*Whenever the Killer comes within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">14 metres</span>''' of the ''Trapped Generator'' their Aura is revealed to all Survivors.
*Damaging the Generator destroys the '''Wiretap'''.


<p>The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of ''Trapped Generators'' are revealed to all Survivors in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.

You know that the best way to stay one step ahead is to keep tabs on the competition.

After repairing Generators for a total of 50 %, Wiretap activates:

  • After continuing to repair any Generator for another 3 seconds, you can press the Active Ability button to install a Wiretap, which stays active for 100/110/120 seconds.
  • Whenever the Killer comes within 14 metres of the Trapped Generator their Aura is revealed to all Survivors.
  • Damaging the Generator destroys the Wiretap.

The Auras of Trapped Generators are revealed to all Survivors in yellow.

 Ada

A Nurse's Calling

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Survivors, who are healing or being healed, are revealed to you when they are within a range of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">28</span>''' '''metres'''.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
  • The Auras of Survivors, who are healing or being healed, are revealed to you when they are within a range of 20/24/28 metres.

"Still attached to the fragments of her past life, she is drawn to those in need of help."

Agitation

You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey.
<p>When carrying a Survivor, you benefit from the following effects:
*'''Increases''' your Movement speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">18</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
*'''Increases''' your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">+12 metres</span>'''.

You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey.

When carrying a Survivor, you benefit from the following effects:

  • Increases your Movement speed by 6/12/18 %.
  • Increases your Terror Radius by +12 metres.
"At some point, the excitement of hooking one of us becomes more important than the desire to kill us."

Alien Instinct

You are so stealthy, sometimes it seems like you appear out of nowhere.
<p>Whenever you hook a Survivor, ''Alien Instinct'' activates:
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the farthest injured Survivor is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5 seconds</span>'''.
*That Survivor suffers from the '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You are so stealthy, sometimes it seems like you appear out of nowhere.

Whenever you hook a Survivor, Alien Instinct activates:

  • The Aura of the farthest injured Survivor is revealed to you for 5 seconds.
  • That Survivor suffers from the Oblivious Status Effect for 16/18/20 seconds.
"Yellow light's for my eyes only." — Dallas
 Xenomorph
Awakened Awareness

Your genes have been altered to heighten your senses in intense situations.
* While carrying a Survivor, the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all other Survivors are revealed to you when they are within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''metres''' of your location.

Your genes have been altered to heighten your senses in intense situations.
  • While carrying a Survivor, the Auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you when they are within 16/18/20 metres of your location.

Bamboozle

After vaulting a Window<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Bamboozle'' calls upon The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to block that Window for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* Blocked Windows cannot be vaulted by Survivors.
* '''Increases''' your general Vaulting speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">15</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
<p>''Bamboozle'' only blocks one Window at a time and does not apply either of its effects to vaulting Pallets<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

After vaulting a Window, Bamboozle calls upon The Entity to block that Window for the next 8/12/16 seconds.
  • Blocked Windows cannot be vaulted by Survivors.
  • Increases your general Vaulting speed by 5/10/15 %.

Bamboozle only blocks one Window at a time and does not apply either of its effects to vaulting Pallets.

 Clown
Barbecue & Chilli

A deep bond with The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> unlocks potential in one's Aura-reading ability.
* After hooking a Survivor, all Survivors who are at least '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''metres''' away from that Hook have their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5 seconds</span>'''.

A deep bond with The Entity unlocks potential in one's Aura-reading ability.
  • After hooking a Survivor, all Survivors who are at least 60/50/40 metres away from that Hook have their Aura revealed to you for 5 seconds.

"I just can't take no pleasure in killing. There's just some things you gotta do. Don't mean you have to like it." — Drayton Sawyer

Beast of Prey

Your lust for a kill is so intense that your connection with The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is momentarily lost, making you totally unpredictable.

Upon gaining the '''''Bloodlust<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''', ''Beast of Prey'' activates:
* Grants the '''''Undetectable<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for as long as '''''Bloodlust''''' is active.
<p>''Beast of Prey'' grants '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;''' bonus Bloodpoints<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for actions in the Hunter<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> Category.

''The bonus Bloodpoints are only awarded during the Trial.''
