Your lust for a kill is so intense that your connection with The Entity is momentarily lost, making you totally unpredictable.

Upon gaining the Bloodlust Status Effect, Beast of Prey activates:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for as long as Bloodlust is active.

Beast of Prey grants 30/40/50 % bonus Bloodpoints for actions in the Hunter Category.
The bonus Bloodpoints are only awarded during the Trial.
"Where did she go?"

 Huntress
Bitter Murmur

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
*Each time a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>is completed, the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16 metres</span>''' of that Generator are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">5 seconds</span>'''.
*Once the last Generator is completed, the Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.


Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
  • Each time a Generatoris completed, the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres of that Generator are revealed to you for 5 seconds.
  • Once the last Generator is completed, the Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 5/7/10 seconds.
 .All
Blood Echo

The agony of one is inflicted onto others.
<p>
* When hooking a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, all other Injured Survivors suffer from the '''''Haemorrhage<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">45 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Blood Echo'' can only be triggered once every '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

The agony of one is inflicted onto others.

  • When hooking a Survivor, all other Injured Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage and Exhausted Status Effects for 45 seconds.

Blood Echo can only be triggered once every 80/70/60 seconds.

"Attack an enemy with precision and their allies will feel it." — Renjiro's Doctrine 6:3

 Oni
Blood Warden

As soon as one Exit Gate<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is opened, ''Blood Warden'' activates.
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> standing within the Exit-Gate area are revealed to you.
<p>Once per Trial, hooking a Survivor while ''Blood Warden'' is active calls upon The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to block the exits for all Survivors for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

As soon as one Exit Gate is opened, Blood Warden activates.
  • The Auras of Survivors standing within the Exit-Gate area are revealed to you.

Once per Trial, hooking a Survivor while Blood Warden is active calls upon The Entity to block the exits for all Survivors for 30/40/60 seconds.
"This is my world. And you can't ever leave." — Freddy Krueger

 Nightmare
Bloodhound

Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance.
* Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are shown in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr19" style="color: #ff0000;">bright red</span>''' and can be tracked for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''seconds''' longer than normal.

Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance.
  • Pools of Blood are shown in bright red and can be tracked for 2/3/4 seconds longer than normal.

"Pebbles shimmering in the moonlight; my life drips down in a trail so easy to follow."

 Wraith
Brutal Strength

Your great strength allows you to shred through your prey's defences.
* '''Increases''' the Action speed of breaking Pallets<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and Breakable Walls<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and damaging Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

Your great strength allows you to shred through your prey's defences.
  • Increases the Action speed of breaking Pallets and Breakable Walls, and damaging Generators by 10/15/20 %.

"It is more than muscles. A dark power motivates the beast."

 Trapper
Call of Brine

Your psychic abilities influence technology in devastating ways.

After performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Call of Brine'' activates for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60 seconds</span>'''.
*The damaged Generator regresses at '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">115</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">120</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">125</span>''' '''&#37;''' of the normal Regression speed and its Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is highlighted to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.
*Receive a ''Loud Noise Notification'' each time a Survivor hits a Good Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> on the affected Generator.


Your psychic abilities influence technology in devastating ways.

After performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator, Call of Brine activates for 60 seconds.

  • The damaged Generator regresses at 115/120/125 % of the normal Regression speed and its Aura is highlighted to you in yellow.
  • Receive a Loud Noise Notification each time a Survivor hits a Good Skill Check on the affected Generator.
 Onryō
Claustrophobia

Your ties to The Entity manifest when your prey attempts to get away.
<p>Whenever a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is completed, ''Claustrophobia'' activates:
*'''Blocks''' every Vault location in the environment to every Survivor for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the blocked Vault locations are highlighted to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.


Your ties to The Entity manifest when your prey attempts to get away.

Whenever a Generator is completed, Claustrophobia activates:

  • Blocks every Vault location in the environment to every Survivor for the next 20/25/30 seconds.
  • The Auras of the blocked Vault locations are highlighted to you in yellow.
 .All
Corrupt Intervention

Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors' chances of survival.
* At the start of the Trial, the '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 Generators</span>''' located farthest from you are blocked by The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">120</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Corrupt Intervention'' deactivates prematurely once the first Survivor is put into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors' chances of survival.
  • At the start of the Trial, the 3 Generators located farthest from you are blocked by The Entity for 80/100/120 seconds.

Corrupt Intervention deactivates prematurely once the first Survivor is put into the Dying State.

"It shall be known across the land that the Gods curse the unfaithful." — (The Tablet of Adiris, 3.7)

 Plague
Coulrophobia

Even those without a fear of clowns know to be terrified of you.
<p>For all Survivors within your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, the following effects apply:
* '''Reduces''' their Healing speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* '''Increases''' the Rotation speed of Healing Skill Checks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">+50 %</span>'''.

Even those without a fear of clowns know to be terrified of you.

For all Survivors within your Terror Radius, the following effects apply:

  • Reduces their Healing speed by 30/40/50 %.
  • Increases the Rotation speed of Healing Skill Checks by +50 %.
 Clown
Coup de Grâce

As the end nears, you go in for the kill.
<p>Whenever a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is completed, ''Coup de Grâce'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2 Tokens</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">10 Tokens</span>''':
*'''Increases''' the distance of your next ''Lunge Attack'' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">75</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">80</span>''' '''&#37;''', while consuming '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">1 Token</span>'''.

''Coup de Grâce'' can only hold a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5 Tokens</span>''' at a time.

As the end nears, you go in for the kill.

Whenever a Generator is completed, Coup de Grâce gains 2 Tokens, up to a maximum of 10 Tokens:

  • Increases the distance of your next Lunge Attack by 70/75/80 %, while consuming 1 Token.
Coup de Grâce can only hold a maximum of 5 Tokens at a time.
 Twins
Dark Devotion

The display of your Powers creates a whirlwind of panic that spreads throughout the land.

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.
<p>Whenever the '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means and thus enters the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Dark Devotion'' activates:
* Your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> transfers to the '''''Obsession''''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''', and its radius is set to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32 metres</span>'''.
* Grants the '''''Undetectable<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the same duration.
<p>The '''''Obsession''''' with your transferred Terror Radius is also considered to be 'inside the Terror Radius' for other purposes.
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

The display of your Powers creates a whirlwind of panic that spreads throughout the land.

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Whenever the Obsession loses a Health State by any means and thus enters the Injured State, Dark Devotion activates:

  • Your Terror Radius transfers to the Obsession for 20/25/30 seconds, and its radius is set to 32 metres.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for the same duration.

The Obsession with your transferred Terror Radius is also considered to be 'inside the Terror Radius' for other purposes.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"And terror shall take hold of a defiant non-believer, who shall falsely announce my arrival." — (The Tablet of Adiris, 48.9)

 Plague
Darkness Revealed

In your presence, places once thought to be safe are perhaps the most dangerous.
* When you search a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8 metres</span>''' of any Locker are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Darkness Revealed'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.

In your presence, places once thought to be safe are perhaps the most dangerous.
  • When you search a Locker, the Auras of all Survivors within 8 metres of any Locker are revealed to you for 3/4/5 seconds.

Darkness Revealed has a cool-down of 30 seconds.
"Stay in the light, my children. In darkness, your fear will expose you." — Otto Stamper

 Dredge
Dead Man's Switch

After hooking a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Dead Man's Switch'' activates for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''':
* While activated, any Survivor that stops repairing a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> before it is fully repaired causes The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to block the Generator until ''Dead Man's Switch'''s effect ends.
* Affected Generators are highlighted by a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>''' Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

After hooking a Survivor, Dead Man's Switch activates for the next 20/25/30 seconds:
  • While activated, any Survivor that stops repairing a Generator before it is fully repaired causes The Entity to block the Generator until Dead Man's Switch's effect ends.
  • Affected Generators are highlighted by a white Aura.

"I've seen the look on a man's face when he realises he's going to die." — Caleb Quinn

 Deathslinger
Deadlock

You induce mental suffering by crushing any hope of escape.

Whenever a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is completed, The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> blocks the Generator with the most progression for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the blocked Generator is revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>''' during this time.

You induce mental suffering by crushing any hope of escape.

Whenever a Generator is completed, The Entity blocks the Generator with the most progression for 20/25/30 seconds.

  • The Aura of the blocked Generator is revealed to you in white during this time.
"Nobody escapes us." — Pinhead
 Cenobite
Deathbound

Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.
<p>Whenever a Survivor heals another Survivor for the equivalent of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>''' Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> at least '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">32 metres</span>''' away from you, ''Deathbound'' activates:
* Causes the Survivor to scream and trigger a ''Loud Noise Notification''.
* For the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">60 seconds</span>''', the Survivor suffers from the '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' whenever they are farther than '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''metres''' from the healed Survivor.

Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.

Whenever a Survivor heals another Survivor for the equivalent of 1 Health State at least 32 metres away from you, Deathbound activates:

  • Causes the Survivor to scream and trigger a Loud Noise Notification.
  • For the next 60 seconds, the Survivor suffers from the Oblivious Status Effect whenever they are farther than 16/12/8 metres from the healed Survivor.
 Executioner
Deerstalker

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> in the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">36</span>''' '''metres''' of your location are revealed to you.


Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
  • The Auras of all Survivors in the Dying State within 20/28/36 metres of your location are revealed to you.
 .All
Discordance

Any Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within a range of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">64</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">96</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">128</span>''' '''metres''' that is being repaired by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2 or more Survivors</span>''' is marked by a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>''' Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
* When the Generator is first highlighted, ''Discordance'' triggers a ''Loud Noise Notification'' on the Generator.
* After the Generator is no longer within range or is being repaired by just '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 Survivor</span>''', the highlighted Aura will linger for another '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">4 seconds</span>'''.

Any Generator within a range of 64/96/128 metres that is being repaired by 2 or more Survivors is marked by a yellow Aura.
  • When the Generator is first highlighted, Discordance triggers a Loud Noise Notification on the Generator.
  • After the Generator is no longer within range or is being repaired by just 1 Survivor, the highlighted Aura will linger for another 4 seconds.

"Smartasses get killed. We always see to that." — The Legion

 Legion
Dissolution

Everything turns to dust. It is as inescapable as the coming of the night.

'''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 seconds</span>''' after injuring a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, ''Dissolution'' activates for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''seconds''':
* While ''Dissolution'' is active, if a Survivor fast vaults over a Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while they are inside your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> will break the Pallet at the end of the vault, deactivating ''Dissolution''.

Everything turns to dust. It is as inescapable as the coming of the night.

3 seconds after injuring a Survivor by any means, Dissolution activates for 12/16/20 seconds:

  • While Dissolution is active, if a Survivor fast vaults over a Pallet while they are inside your Terror Radius, The Entity will break the Pallet at the end of the vault, deactivating Dissolution.
"The Garden shall be a place of perfect Joy; through Joy, nothing shall stand in our way." — Otto Stamper
 Dredge
Distressing

Your horrifying emanation strikes at a supernaturally long distance.
*'''Increases''' your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">22</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">26</span>''' '''&#37;'''
*Grants '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">100 %</span>''' bonus Bloodpoints<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for all actions in the Deviousness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> Category.


Your horrifying emanation strikes at a supernaturally long distance.
  • Increases your Terror Radius by 22/24/26 %
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for all actions in the Deviousness Category.
 .All
Dragon's Grip

Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> activates ''Dragon's Grip'' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>''':
* The first Survivor interacting with the damaged Generator will scream, revealing their location for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 seconds</span>''', and suffer from the '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">60 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Dragon's Grip'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">120</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">80</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator activates Dragon's Grip for the next 30 seconds:
  • The first Survivor interacting with the damaged Generator will scream, revealing their location for 4 seconds, and suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds.

Dragon's Grip has a cool-down of 120/100/80 seconds.

"Such potential in this compound... even the slightest trace causes unnatural effects." — Journal of Talbot Grimes

 Blight
Dying Light

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.

Each time you hook a Survivor other than your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', you gain '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''':
* For as long as the '''''Obsession''''' is alive, all other Survivors suffer from a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">2.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''&#37;''' penalty to Repairing, Healing, and Sabotaging speeds per Token, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">22</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">27.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">33</span>''' '''&#37;''' or '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">11 Tokens</span>'''.
* The '''''Obsession''''' is unaffected by this penalty and instead granted a permanent '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">33 %</span>''' Action Speed bonus to Unhooking and Healing other Survivors.
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Each time you hook a Survivor other than your Obsession, you gain 1 Token:

  • For as long as the Obsession is alive, all other Survivors suffer from a stack-able 2/2.5/3 % penalty to Repairing, Healing, and Sabotaging speeds per Token, up to a maximum of 22/27.5/33 % or 11 Tokens.
  • The Obsession is unaffected by this penalty and instead granted a permanent 33 % Action Speed bonus to Unhooking and Healing other Survivors.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"This isn't a man..." — Dr Sam Loomis

 Shape
Enduring

You are resilient to pain.
* '''Reduces''' ''Pallet Stun'' duration by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">45</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
<p>''Enduring'' has no effect while carrying a Survivor.

You are resilient to pain.
  • Reduces Pallet Stun duration by 40/45/50 %.

Enduring has no effect while carrying a Survivor.

"He stops at nothing."

 Hillbilly
Eruption

The NE-α parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> applies ''Eruption'':
*All affected Generators are highlighted to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.
*The next time any Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> enters the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, all affected Generators explode and immediately start regressing, which removes the highlighted Aura.
*'''Instantly regresses''' the Generator by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">-10 %</span>''' of its maximum possible Progression.
*Causes all Survivors repairing the afflicted Generators to scream and reveal their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">12</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''Eruption'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.

The NE-α parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator applies Eruption:

  • All affected Generators are highlighted to you in yellow.
  • The next time any Survivor enters the Dying State by any means, all affected Generators explode and immediately start regressing, which removes the highlighted Aura.
  • Instantly regresses the Generator by -10 % of its maximum possible Progression.
  • Causes all Survivors repairing the afflicted Generators to scream and reveal their Aura to you for 8/10/12 seconds.
Eruption has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

"It can use weapons?" — Jill Valentine

 Nemesis
Fearmonger

Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey.

All Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> repairing a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> suffer from the following afflictions:
*'''Incurs''' the '''''Blindness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects''' for the duration of the Repair action.
**If a Survivor was already suffering from '''''Exhausted''''' prior to ''Fearmonger'' affecting them, the '''Status Effect's''' timer will be paused and not recover for the duration of the Repair action.
**Both '''Status Effects''' linger for another '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''seconds''' after a Survivor stops repairing.


Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey.

All Survivors repairing a Generator suffer from the following afflictions:

  • Incurs the Blindness and Exhausted Status Effects for the duration of the Repair action.
    • If a Survivor was already suffering from Exhausted prior to Fearmonger affecting them, the Status Effect's timer will be paused and not recover for the duration of the Repair action.
    • Both Status Effects linger for another 3/4/5 seconds after a Survivor stops repairing.
 .All
Fire Up

The increased pressure of losing your preys fills you with anger and gives you unsuspected motivation.
<p>Each time a Generator is completed, ''Fire Up'' grows in power and gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">5 Tokens</span>'''.

Each Token applies a stack-able buff of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''&#37;''' per Token, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">17.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''&#37;''', to the following Action speeds:
*Picking up and dropping Survivors.
*Breaking Breakable Walls<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and Pallets<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and damaging Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
*Vaulting Windows<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.


The increased pressure of losing your preys fills you with anger and gives you unsuspected motivation.

Each time a Generator is completed, Fire Up grows in power and gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 5 Tokens.
Each Token applies a stack-able buff of 3/3.5/4 % per Token, up to a maximum of 15/17.5/20 %, to the following Action speeds:

  • Picking up and dropping Survivors.
  • Breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, and damaging Generators.
  • Vaulting Windows.

"Now why don't you just fucking die?" — Freddy Krueger

 Nightmare
Forced Hesitation

You have learnt the emotional weaknesses of the organics, and how to exploit them.
* Whenever a Survivor is put into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, all other Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16 metres</span>''' of them suffer from a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">-20 %</span>''' '''''Hindered<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">10 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Forced Hesitation'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You have learnt the emotional weaknesses of the organics, and how to exploit them.
  • Whenever a Survivor is put into the Dying State by any means, all other Survivors within 16 metres of them suffer from a -20 % Hindered Status Effect for 10 seconds.

Forced Hesitation has a cool-down of 40/35/30 seconds.

"THE ORGANIC MIND'S CAPACITY FOR EMPATHY GOES BEYOND HINDRANCE!" — HUX-A7-13

 Singularity
Forced Penance

Those who stand in the way of duty will suffer harsh judgement.

Survivors who take a ''Protection Hit'' suffer from the '''''Broken<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">80</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Those who stand in the way of duty will suffer harsh judgement.
Survivors who take a Protection Hit suffer from the Broken Status Effect for the next 60/70/80 seconds.
 Executioner
Franklin's Demise

Your vicious ''Basic Attacks'' make Survivors drop their Items<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> on impact.
* If not recovered within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">150</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">120</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">90</span>''' '''seconds''', the lost Items will have their Charges depleted by The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of lost Items are revealed to you within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32 metres</span>''' and slowly fade from '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>''' to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr19" style="color: #ff0000;">red</span>''' as the timer elapses.

Your vicious Basic Attacks make Survivors drop their Items on impact.
  • If not recovered within 150/120/90 seconds, the lost Items will have their Charges depleted by The Entity.
  • The Auras of lost Items are revealed to you within 32 metres and slowly fade from white to red as the timer elapses.

"Sally, I hear something. Stop! Stop!" — Franklin Hardesty

 Cannibal
Furtive Chase

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.

You lurk in the shadows, eliminating your victims one by one.

Each time you hook your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', you gain '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''Tokens''':
* While in a Chase, your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is reduced by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 metres</span>''' per accumulated Token.
* When a Survivor rescues the '''''Obsession''''' from the Hook, that Survivor will become the new '''''Obsession'''''.
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

You lurk in the shadows, eliminating your victims one by one.
Each time you hook your Obsession, you gain 1 Token, up to a maximum of 2/3/4 Tokens:

  • While in a Chase, your Terror Radius is reduced by 4 metres per accumulated Token.
  • When a Survivor rescues the Obsession from the Hook, that Survivor will become the new Obsession.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.
"You have no idea what I have planned for you. It'll be in the news for weeks. I'll make sure of that." — The Ghost Face

 Ghost Face
Game Afoot

First you pick your prey, then you pick it apart.
* Whenever you hit the Survivor with the highest cumulative Chase time, with a ''Basic Attack'', they become the '''''Obsession'''''.
<p>While you are chasing your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', ''Game Afoot'' activates its secondary effect:
* Grants a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5 %</span>''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds''' after damaging a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or breaking a Breakable Wall<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

First you pick your prey, then you pick it apart.
  • Whenever you hit the Survivor with the highest cumulative Chase time, with a Basic Attack, they become the Obsession.

While you are chasing your Obsession, Game Afoot activates its secondary effect:

  • Grants a 5 % Haste Status Effect for 8/9/10 seconds after damaging a Generator or breaking a Breakable Wall or Pallet

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"This one might actually be a challenge..." — Sonhadores Sombrios, Issue #3

 Skull Merchant
Gearhead

You have got an ear for well-oiled gears.
<p>After a Survivor loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Gearhead'' activates for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>''':
* While ''Gearhead'' is active, a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> succeeding a Good Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while repairing reveals their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You have got an ear for well-oiled gears.

After a Survivor loses a Health State, Gearhead activates for 30 seconds:

  • While Gearhead is active, a Survivor succeeding a Good Skill Check while repairing reveals their Aura to you for 6/7/8 seconds.

"Sometimes a man's best work is what puts him in the grave." — The Prison Warden

 Deathslinger
Genetic Limits

Around you, the limits of human life become readily apparent.
* Whenever a Survivor finishes a Healing action, they suffer from the '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">32</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Around you, the limits of human life become readily apparent.
  • Whenever a Survivor finishes a Healing action, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 24/28/32 seconds.

"THE ORGANIC BODY IS SO LIMITED!" — HUX-A7-13

 Singularity
Grim Embrace

Your act of servitude to The Entity has not gone unnoticed.
<p>Each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time, ''Grim Embrace'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>'''.
<p>Upon reaching '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 Tokens</span>''', ''Grim Embrace'' activates:
*'''Blocks''' all Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the '''''Obsession''''' is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">6 seconds</span>'''.

Your act of servitude to The Entity has not gone unnoticed.

Each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time, Grim Embrace gains 1 Token.

Upon reaching 4 Tokens, Grim Embrace activates:

  • Blocks all Generators for 30/35/40 seconds.
  • The Aura of the Obsession is revealed to you for 6 seconds.
"Are we nothing but prisoners to our sorrow?" — Carmina Mora
 Artist
Hex: Blood Favour

A Hex that gains the favour of The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> when blood is spilt.
* Whenever a Survivor loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means and thus enters the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Hex: Blood Favour'' calls upon The Entity to block all Pallets<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">32</span>''' '''metres''' of that Survivor's location from being pulled down for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex that gains the favour of The Entity when blood is spilt.
  • Whenever a Survivor loses a Health State by any means and thus enters the Injured State or the Dying State, Hex: Blood Favour calls upon The Entity to block all Pallets within 24/28/32 metres of that Survivor's location from being pulled down for the next 15 seconds.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"It would be no leap of the imagination to suggest that the Trials are a biological response of sorts." — Journal of Talbot Grimes

 Blight
Hex: Crowd Control

A Hex that ensures those lesser than you are properly herded.
<p>Whenever a Survivor performs a ''Rush Vault action'', ''Hex: Crowd Control'' triggers its effect:
*'''Blocks''' the vaulted Window to every Survivor for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex that ensures those lesser than you are properly herded.

Whenever a Survivor performs a Rush Vault action, Hex: Crowd Control triggers its effect:

  • Blocks the vaulted Window to every Survivor for the next 40/50/60 seconds.
All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"You have no control. People like you never did." — Ji-Woon Hak

 Trickster
Hex: Devour Hope

A Hex rooting its power on hope.

The false hope of Survivors ignites your hunger.
<p>Each time a Survivor is rescued from a Hook while you are at least '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24 metres</span>''' away, ''Hex: Devour Hope'' receives '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">5 Tokens</span>''':
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">2 Tokens</span>''': '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10 seconds</span>''' after hooking a Survivor, gain a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''&#37;''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">10 seconds</span>'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">3 Tokens</span>''': all Survivors suffer from a permanent '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">5 Tokens</span>''': grants the ability to kill all Survivors by your own hand.

''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex rooting its power on hope.

The false hope of Survivors ignites your hunger.

Each time a Survivor is rescued from a Hook while you are at least 24 metres away, Hex: Devour Hope receives 1 Token, up to a maximum of 5 Tokens:

  • 2 Tokens: 10 seconds after hooking a Survivor, gain a 3/4/5 % Haste Status Effect for the next 10 seconds.
  • 3 Tokens: all Survivors suffer from a permanent Exposed Status Effect.
  • 5 Tokens: grants the ability to kill all Survivors by your own hand.
All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"If you do nothing, you have their blood on your hands. If you save them, her hunger grows."

 Hag
Hex: Face the Darkness

You make an example of one of your victims, forcing their allies to become awed by your power.
<p>Once you injure a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, if there is still a Dull Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> remaining on the Map, ''Hex: Face the Darkness'' activates and lights it, cursing that Survivor:
*All other Survivors will scream every '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''seconds''' if they are outside of the Killer's Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, revealing their Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2 seconds</span>''' each time.


<p>''Hex: Face the Darkness'' deactivates when the Cursed Survivor either enters the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or becomes Healthy<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, extinguishing its Totem.
<p>''Hex: Face the Darkness'' is disabled for the remainder of the Trial if Survivors manage to cleanse its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You make an example of one of your victims, forcing their allies to become awed by your power.

Once you injure a Survivor by any means, if there is still a Dull Totem remaining on the Map, Hex: Face the Darkness activates and lights it, cursing that Survivor:

  • All other Survivors will scream every 35/30/25 seconds if they are outside of the Killer's Terror Radius, revealing their Auras for 2 seconds each time.

Hex: Face the Darkness deactivates when the Cursed Survivor either enters the Dying State or becomes Healthy, extinguishing its Totem.

Hex: Face the Darkness is disabled for the remainder of the Trial if Survivors manage to cleanse its Hex Totem.

"I shall make an example of one. These mewling worms will never know peace." — Tarhos Kovács

 Knight
Hex: Haunted Ground

Two trapped Hex Totems<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> will spawn in the Trial Grounds.
* When either Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed, all Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> suffer from the '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* The second Hex Totem will immediately turn into a Dull Totem.

Two trapped Hex Totems will spawn in the Trial Grounds.
  • When either Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed, all Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 40/50/60 seconds.
  • The second Hex Totem will immediately turn into a Dull Totem.

"Her home become profane."

 Spirit
Hex: Huntress Lullaby

A Hex rooting its power in despair.

Your hunt is an irresistible song of dread which muddles your prey's attention.
*Survivors failing a Repair Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>'''instantly regress''' the Generator by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''&#37;''' of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.
*Survivors failing a Healing Skill Check '''instantly regress''' the Healing Action by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''&#37;''' of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.

Each time a Survivor is hooked, ''Hex: Huntress Lullaby'' grows in power and gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">5 Tokens</span>'''.

Each Token '''reduces''' the timer between the Skill Check Warning cue and the Skill Check appearing for both Repair and Healing Skill Checks:
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">1 Token</span>''': reduction of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">-14 %</span>'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">2 Tokens</span>''': reduction of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">-28 %</span>'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">3 Tokens</span>''': reduction of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">-42 %</span>'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">4 Tokens</span>''': reduction of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr10" style="color: #0e98ff;">-56 %</span>'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">5 Tokens</span>''': complete suppression of the Warning cue.

''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex rooting its power in despair.

Your hunt is an irresistible song of dread which muddles your prey's attention.

  • Survivors failing a Repair Skill Checkinstantly regress the Generator by 2/4/6 % of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.
  • Survivors failing a Healing Skill Check instantly regress the Healing Action by 2/4/6 % of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.

Each time a Survivor is hooked, Hex: Huntress Lullaby grows in power and gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 5 Tokens.
Each Token reduces the timer between the Skill Check Warning cue and the Skill Check appearing for both Repair and Healing Skill Checks:

  • 1 Token: reduction of -14 %.
  • 2 Tokens: reduction of -28 %.
  • 3 Tokens: reduction of -42 %.
  • 4 Tokens: reduction of -56 %.
  • 5 Tokens: complete suppression of the Warning cue.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"That song, it drives me crazy!"

 Huntress
Hex: No One Escapes Death

A Hex rooting its power on hope.

You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.
<p>Once the Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are powered, if there is still a Dull Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> remaining on the Map, ''Hex: No One Escapes Death'' activates and lights it:
*'''Increases''' your Movement speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
