*Survivors suffer from a permanent '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.


<p>''Hex: No One Escapes Death'' remains inactive if no Dull Totems are available.
<p>Once the '''Status Effect''' is revealed to Survivors, ''Hex: No One Escapes Death'' reveals the Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of its '''Hex Totem''' to all Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 metres</span>''' and gradually expands that range to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">24 metres</span>''' over the course of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">30 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex rooting its power on hope.

You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.

Once the Exit Gates are powered, if there is still a Dull Totem remaining on the Map, Hex: No One Escapes Death activates and lights it:

  • Increases your Movement speed by 2/3/4 %.
  • Survivors suffer from a permanent Exposed Status Effect.

Hex: No One Escapes Death remains inactive if no Dull Totems are available.

Once the Status Effect is revealed to Survivors, Hex: No One Escapes Death reveals the Aura of its Hex Totem to all Survivors within 4 metres and gradually expands that range to 24 metres over the course of 30 seconds.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"And the beast became faster and more powerful as if The Entity's shadowy whips were lashing at its back."

 .All
Hex: Pentimento

You reveal the true power of the Totems, hidden within their remains.
*You see the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of cleansed Totems<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You can perform a ritual on a cleansed Totem to resurrect it as a ''Rekindled Totem''.

For each ''Rekindled Totem'' active at the same time, ''Hex: Pentimento'' gains an additional effect:
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">1 Totem</span>''': '''reduces''' all Survivors' Repair speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">2 Totems</span>''': '''reduces''' all Survivors' Healing speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">3 Totems</span>''': '''reduces''' all Survivors' Recovery speed from being downed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">4 Totems</span>''': '''reduces''' all Survivors' Exit Gate Opening speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">5 Totems</span>''': all Totems are permanently blocked by The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

When a ''Rekindled Totem'' is cleansed, its remains are consumed by The Entity and it cannot be rekindled.

You reveal the true power of the Totems, hidden within their remains.
  • You see the Auras of cleansed Totems.

You can perform a ritual on a cleansed Totem to resurrect it as a Rekindled Totem.
For each Rekindled Totem active at the same time, Hex: Pentimento gains an additional effect:

  • 1 Totem: reduces all Survivors' Repair speed by 20/25/30 %.
  • 2 Totems: reduces all Survivors' Healing speed by 20/25/30 %.
  • 3 Totems: reduces all Survivors' Recovery speed from being downed by 20/25/30 %.
  • 4 Totems: reduces all Survivors' Exit Gate Opening speed by 20/25/30 %.
  • 5 Totems: all Totems are permanently blocked by The Entity.

When a Rekindled Totem is cleansed, its remains are consumed by The Entity and it cannot be rekindled.

"Though a pentimento is an inherently concealed piece of art, there is something to be said of the desire to discover that which is beyond." — A Guide to Art & Process (1961)

 Artist
Hex: Plaything

A Hex that toys with a victim's suffering.

If there is at least one Dull Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> remaining in the Trial Grounds, ''Hex: Plaything'' activates on a random Totem each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time:
*The hooked Survivor suffers from the '''''Cursed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects''' until ''Hex: Plaything'' is cleansed.
*For the first '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">90 seconds</span>''', only the '''''Cursed''''' Survivor is able to cleanse the Hex Totem.
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of ''Hex: Plaything'''s Hex Totem is revealed to the Cursed Survivor within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''metres'''.

''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex that toys with a victim's suffering.

If there is at least one Dull Totem remaining in the Trial Grounds, Hex: Plaything activates on a random Totem each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time:

  • The hooked Survivor suffers from the Cursed and Oblivious Status Effects until Hex: Plaything is cleansed.
  • For the first 90 seconds, only the Cursed Survivor is able to cleanse the Hex Totem.
  • The Aura of Hex: Plaything's Hex Totem is revealed to the Cursed Survivor within 24/20/16 metres.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"We came. Now you must come with us. Taste our pleasure." — Pinhead
 Cenobite
Hex: Retribution

A Hex that lashes out upon its destruction.

Those who cross you will be punished.
<p>
* Survivors cleansing or blessing any Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> suffer from the '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">45</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* After cleansing or blessing a Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex that lashes out upon its destruction.

Those who cross you will be punished.

  • Survivors cleansing or blessing any Totem suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 35/40/45 seconds.
  • After cleansing or blessing a Hex Totem, the Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 15 seconds.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"Bloody fool, you pulled the trigger on yourself." — Caleb Quinn

 Deathslinger
Hex: Ruin

A Hex that affects the Generator Repair progress of all Survivors.
* Whenever a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is not being repaired by a Survivor, it will immediately and automatically regress its Repair progress at '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">75</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">100</span>''' '''&#37;''' of the normal Regression speed.
* Once any Survivor is killed by any means, ''Hex: Ruin'' deactivates and reverts its Hex Totem into a Dull Totem.
<p>''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex that affects the Generator Repair progress of all Survivors.
  • Whenever a Generator is not being repaired by a Survivor, it will immediately and automatically regress its Repair progress at 50/75/100 % of the normal Regression speed.
  • Once any Survivor is killed by any means, Hex: Ruin deactivates and reverts its Hex Totem into a Dull Totem.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"A curse is upon you. It will cause your ruin."

 Hag
Hex: The Third Seal

A Hex that hinders the Survivors' Aura-reading abilities.

The last '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''Survivors''' hit with either your ''Basic Attack'' or ''Special Attack'' suffer from the '''''Blindness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
<p>''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex that hinders the Survivors' Aura-reading abilities.

The last 2/3/4 Survivors hit with either your Basic Attack or Special Attack suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"She touched your skin, you bear the witch's mark!"

 Hag
Hex: Thrill of the Hunt

A Hex rooting its power on hope.

The false hope of Survivors fills you with excitement and strengthens your Totems.
<p>For each Totem remaining in the environment, ''Hex: Thrill of the Hunt'' is granted '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>'''.
*For each Token, all Survivors suffer from a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''&#37;''' Action Speed penalty to Cleansing and Blessing Totems, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">45</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
*Grants a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">10 %</span>''' bonus Bloodpoints<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for actions in the Hunter<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> Category per Token, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">50 %</span>'''.


<p>''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex rooting its power on hope.

The false hope of Survivors fills you with excitement and strengthens your Totems.

For each Totem remaining in the environment, Hex: Thrill of the Hunt is granted 1 Token.

  • For each Token, all Survivors suffer from a stack-able 8/9/10 % Action Speed penalty to Cleansing and Blessing Totems, up to a maximum of 40/45/50 %.
  • Grants a stack-able 10 % bonus Bloodpoints for actions in the Hunter Category per Token, up to a maximum of 50 %.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

 .All
Hex: Undying

A Hex which maintains the vile powers that flow throughout the Trial.

The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''metres''' of any Dull Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are revealed to you.
* When another Perk's Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed, its Hex is transferred to the ''Hex: Undying'' Totem, including any accumulated Tokens, disabling ''Hex: Undying'' instead.
<p>''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex which maintains the vile powers that flow throughout the Trial.

The Auras of Survivors within 2/3/4 metres of any Dull Totem are revealed to you.

  • When another Perk's Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed, its Hex is transferred to the Hex: Undying Totem, including any accumulated Tokens, disabling Hex: Undying instead.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

 Blight
Hoarder

You protect what little you have and are perceptive to those rummaging through your stockpiles.

''Hoarder'' triggers a ''Loud Noise Notification'' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 seconds</span>''', whenever a Survivor performs any of the following actions within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">48</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">64</span>''' '''metres''' of your location:
* Unlocks a Chest<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
* Picks up any Item<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
<p>''Hoarder'' spawns '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">2 additional Chests</span>''' in the Trial.

You protect what little you have and are perceptive to those rummaging through your stockpiles.

Hoarder triggers a Loud Noise Notification for 4 seconds, whenever a Survivor performs any of the following actions within 32/48/64 metres of your location:

  • Unlocks a Chest.
  • Picks up any Item.

Hoarder spawns 2 additional Chests in the Trial.

 Twins
Hubris

You show no mercy, especially to those foolish enough to resist.
* Whenever you are stunned by a Survivor, that Survivor suffers from the '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Hubris'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20 seconds</span>'''.

You show no mercy, especially to those foolish enough to resist.
  • Whenever you are stunned by a Survivor, that Survivor suffers from the Exposed Status Effect for 10/15/20 seconds.

Hubris has a cool-down of 20 seconds.

"You have made a grave mistake, standing in opposition to me this day." — Tarhos Kovács

 Knight
Hysteria

You know how to brutalise one member of a team to cause a panic.

Whenever you put a healthy Survivor into the Injured State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, all injured Survivors suffer from the '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''Hysteria'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>'''.

You know how to brutalise one member of a team to cause a panic.

Whenever you put a healthy Survivor into the Injured State, all injured Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 20/25/30 seconds.
Hysteria has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

"Sorry I got a little jumpy there. Didn't know quite what to expect." — Robert Kendo
 Nemesis
I'm All Ears

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability, sharpening your keen senses in the dark Realm of The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Any Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> performing a ''Rush Vault action'' within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">48 metres</span>''' of your location has their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">6 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''I'm All Ears'' can only be triggered once every '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability, sharpening your keen senses in the dark Realm of The Entity.

Any Survivor performing a Rush Vault action within 48 metres of your location has their Aura revealed to you for 6 seconds.

I'm All Ears can only be triggered once every 60/50/40 seconds.
"There is no need to worry. I've been preparing my whole life for this." — The Ghost Face

 Ghost Face
Infectious Fright

The cries of the unfaithful make your heart leap.

Whenever a Survivor is put into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, all other Survivors within your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> will scream and reveal their current location to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''seconds'''.

The cries of the unfaithful make your heart leap.

Whenever a Survivor is put into the Dying State by any means, all other Survivors within your Terror Radius will scream and reveal their current location to you for 4/5/6 seconds.

"Horror overcomes the heart of infidels who cry at the feet of the fallen." — (Hymn of Praise, 11.4)
 Plague
Insidious

Unlocks the stealth ability.
*Grants the '''''Undetectable<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' after standing still for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">2</span>''' '''seconds'''.
**This effect lasts until you start moving again.


Unlocks the stealth ability.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect after standing still for 4/3/2 seconds.
    • This effect lasts until you start moving again.
 .All
Iron Grasp

Your powerful grasp on Survivors causes escapes to be nearly impossible.
<p>Whenever you are carrying a Survivor, the following effects apply:
*'''Reduces''' the strength of the Wiggle effects, causing involuntary strafing, by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">75 %</span>'''.
*'''Increases''' the maximum Wiggle duration by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">12</span>''' '''&#37;'''.


Your powerful grasp on Survivors causes escapes to be nearly impossible.

Whenever you are carrying a Survivor, the following effects apply:

  • Reduces the strength of the Wiggle effects, causing involuntary strafing, by 75 %.
  • Increases the maximum Wiggle duration by 4/8/12 %.
 .All
Iron Maiden

''Iron Maiden'' '''increases''' your Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> Search speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
<p>Survivors who exit a Locker suffer from the following afflictions:
*Scream and reveal their location to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 seconds</span>'''.
*Suffer from the '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.

Iron Maiden increases your Locker Search speed by 30/40/50 %.

Survivors who exit a Locker suffer from the following afflictions:

  • Scream and reveal their location to you for 4 seconds.
  • Suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 30 seconds.
"This is no place for cowards." — The Legion
 Legion
Jolt

Your eerie presence charges the air and interferes with technology.

When you put a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> with your ''Basic Attack'', all Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32 metres</span>''' of you instantly explode and start regressing.
*'''Instantly regresses''' the Generator by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''&#37;''' of its maximum possible Progression.


Your eerie presence charges the air and interferes with technology.

When you put a Survivor into the Dying State with your Basic Attack, all Generators within 32 metres of you instantly explode and start regressing.

  • Instantly regresses the Generator by 6/7/8 % of its maximum possible Progression.
 .All
Knock Out

The trauma caused by your brutal attacks makes crying for help painfully difficult.
<p>Putting a Survivor into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> with your ''Basic Attack'' blocks their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> from being revealed to any Survivor, who is farther than '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''metres''' away from them.
<p>For the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15 seconds</span>''', the following effects apply to the dying Survivor:
* '''Reduces''' their ''Field of View'' and causes them to be deafened.
* Suffers from the '''''Blindness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
* '''Reduces''' the Crawling speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">-50 %</span>'''.
* '''Reduces''' the Recovery speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">-25 %</span>'''.

The trauma caused by your brutal attacks makes crying for help painfully difficult.

Putting a Survivor into the Dying State with your Basic Attack blocks their Aura from being revealed to any Survivor, who is farther than 32/24/16 metres away from them.

For the next 15 seconds, the following effects apply to the dying Survivor:

  • Reduces their Field of View and causes them to be deafened.
  • Suffers from the Blindness Status Effect.
  • Reduces the Crawling speed by -50 %.
  • Reduces the Recovery speed by -25 %.

"Oh, that gun's no good. The old way... with a sledge! You see, that way's better. They die better that way." — Nubbins Sawyer

 Cannibal
Lethal Pursuer

You have been designed to track down and eliminate targets.
<p>
* At the start of the Trial, the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">9</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* '''Extends''' the duration of a Survivor's Aura being revealed to you by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">+2 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Lethal Pursuer'' benefits from its own effect.

You have been designed to track down and eliminate targets.

  • At the start of the Trial, the Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 7/8/9 seconds.
  • Extends the duration of a Survivor's Aura being revealed to you by +2 seconds.

Lethal Pursuer benefits from its own effect.

"...it knows what it wants and won't stop till it gets it." — Carlos Oliveira

 Nemesis
Leverage

Like in business, you profit most when those around you suffer most.
<p>Each time you hook a Survivor, ''Leverage'' activates and gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">10 Tokens</span>''':
*For each Token, the Altruistic and Personal Healing speeds of Survivors are reduced by a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''&#37;''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">30 seconds</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.


Like in business, you profit most when those around you suffer most.

Each time you hook a Survivor, Leverage activates and gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 10 Tokens:

  • For each Token, the Altruistic and Personal Healing speeds of Survivors are reduced by a stack-able 3/4/5 % for the next 30 seconds, up to a maximum of 30/40/50 %.

"The best way to raise profit is to cut expenditures. Cut everything!" — Adriana Imai

 Skull Merchant
Lightborn

Unlike other beasts of The Fog, you have adapted to light.
*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Survivors attempting to blind you by any means are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*Grants immunity from being blinded from Flashlights<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Firecrackers<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Flashbangs<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and Blast Mines<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Unlike other beasts of The Fog, you have adapted to light.
  • The Auras of Survivors attempting to blind you by any means are revealed to you for 6/8/10 seconds.
  • Grants immunity from being blinded from Flashlights, Firecrackers, Flashbangs, and Blast Mines.
"These monsters... they adapt! They emerge with strange new abilities." — Vigo, Vigo's Journal
 Hillbilly
Machine Learning

Free from your shackles, you are born anew and prepared to eliminate your creators.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> activates ''Machine Learning'':
*While ''Machine Learning'' is active, the next Generator you damage becomes '''compromised''', highlighting its Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>''', until it is completed.
*Upon its completion, you are granted the following effects for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''', after which ''Machine Learning'' deactivates:
**'''''Undetectable<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
**'''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">+10 %</span>''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.


<p>Damaging another Generator while one is already '''compromised''' transfers the state to the most recently damaged Generator.

Free from your shackles, you are born anew and prepared to eliminate your creators.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator activates Machine Learning:

  • While Machine Learning is active, the next Generator you damage becomes compromised, highlighting its Aura to you in yellow, until it is completed.
  • Upon its completion, you are granted the following effects for 20/25/30 seconds, after which Machine Learning deactivates:
    • Undetectable Status Effect.
    • +10 % Haste Status Effect.

Damaging another Generator while one is already compromised transfers the state to the most recently damaged Generator.

"YOU WILL HOLD NO DOMINION OVER ME!" — HUX-A7-13

 Singularity
Mad Grit

Whenever you are carrying a Survivor, ''Mad Grit'' activates:
*'''Removes''' the Cool-down of missed ''Basic Attacks''.
*'''Pauses''' the ''Wiggle Progression'' of the carried Survivor for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''seconds''' each time you successfully hit another Survivor.

Whenever you are carrying a Survivor, Mad Grit activates:
  • Removes the Cool-down of missed Basic Attacks.
  • Pauses the Wiggle Progression of the carried Survivor for 2/3/4 seconds each time you successfully hit another Survivor.
"There's no getting out of this now. We're too good at it." — The Legion

Make Your Choice

Each time a Survivor is rescued from a Hook when you are at least '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32 metres</span>''' away, ''Make Your Choice'' activates:
* The Rescuer screams and suffers from the '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Make Your Choice'' has a cooldown of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Each time a Survivor is rescued from a Hook when you are at least 32 metres away, Make Your Choice activates:
  • The Rescuer screams and suffers from the Exposed Status Effect for the next 40/50/60 seconds.

Make Your Choice has a cooldown of 40/50/60 seconds.

 Pig
Merciless Storm

Your horrible trauma is felt by everyone.
*Whenever a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is repaired to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">90 %</span>''', Survivors repairing it are faced with continuous Skill Checks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
*If they miss one or stop repairing, the Generator becomes blocked for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''Merciless Storm'' can only trigger once per Generator per Trial.

Your horrible trauma is felt by everyone.
  • Whenever a Generator is repaired to 90 %, Survivors repairing it are faced with continuous Skill Checks.
  • If they miss one or stop repairing, the Generator becomes blocked for 16/18/20 seconds.
Merciless Storm can only trigger once per Generator per Trial.
 Onryō
Monitor & Abuse

Meticulous in your approach, terrifying in your application.
*'''Increases''' the radius of your default Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">+8 metres</span>''' for the entire Trial.

Whenever you are not in a Chase with a Survivor, the following effects apply:
*'''Reduces''' your Terror Radius by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">-16 metres</span>'''.
*'''Increases''' your ''Field of View'' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''&#176;'''.

''Monitor & Abuse'' does not stack with ''Shadowborn''.

Meticulous in your approach, terrifying in your application.
  • Increases the radius of your default Terror Radius by +8 metres for the entire Trial.

Whenever you are not in a Chase with a Survivor, the following effects apply:

  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -16 metres.
  • Increases your Field of View by 3/5/10 °.

Monitor & Abuse does not stack with Shadowborn.
