 Doctor
Nemesis

You seek retribution on those who have wronged you.
<p>
*Any Survivor who blinds you or stuns you using a Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> becomes the '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>'''''.
*Anytime your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' switches to another Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, that Survivor then suffers from the '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds''' and their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 seconds</span>'''.


<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You seek retribution on those who have wronged you.

  • Any Survivor who blinds you or stuns you using a Pallet or a Locker becomes the Obsession.
  • Anytime your Obsession switches to another Survivor by any means, that Survivor then suffers from the Oblivious Status Effect for 40/50/60 seconds and their Aura is revealed to you for 4 seconds.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"Only a fool would spit in a demon's face and declare victory." — Renjiro's Doctrine 4:9

 Oni
No Way Out

You are not going to let just anyone into the VIP room.

For each Survivor you hook for the first time, ''No Way Out'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>'''.

Once the Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> have been powered, ''No Way Out'' activates:
* When a Survivor interacts with an Exit Gate Switch, you receive a ''Loud Noise Notification'' and The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> blocks both Exit Gate Switches<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">12 seconds</span>''' and an additional '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">12</span>''' '''seconds''' per Token in your possession, up to a combined maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">36</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">48</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You are not going to let just anyone into the VIP room.

For each Survivor you hook for the first time, No Way Out gains 1 Token.
Once the Exit Gates have been powered, No Way Out activates:

  • When a Survivor interacts with an Exit Gate Switch, you receive a Loud Noise Notification and The Entity blocks both Exit Gate Switches for 12 seconds and an additional 6/9/12 seconds per Token in your possession, up to a combined maximum of 36/48/60 seconds.

"That sound when you bleed... let me hear it again." — Ji-Woon Hak

 Trickster
Nowhere to Hide

The machinations of the weak and craven draw your ire.

Your anger forces Survivors to reveal themselves.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> triggers ''Nowhere to Hide'':
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24 metres</span>''' of your position are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''seconds'''.

The machinations of the weak and craven draw your ire.

Your anger forces Survivors to reveal themselves.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator triggers Nowhere to Hide:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 24 metres of your position are revealed to you for 3/4/5 seconds.

"Out with you, cowards! Show yourselves!" — Tarhos Kovács

 Knight
Oppression

Life has been difficult for you, so you will make it difficult for others.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> activates ''Oppression'':
* Causes up to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 additional Generators</span>''' to also start regressing.
* Triggers a difficult Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> on all Survivors currently repairing one of those Generators.
<p>''Oppression'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">120</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">80</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Life has been difficult for you, so you will make it difficult for others.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator activates Oppression:

  • Causes up to 3 additional Generators to also start regressing.
  • Triggers a difficult Skill Check on all Survivors currently repairing one of those Generators.

Oppression has a cool-down of 120/100/80 seconds.

"Damn them as they would damn us." — Charlotte Deshayes

 Twins
Overcharge

You are fuelled by your hate for progress.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> applies ''Overcharge'':
*The next Survivor interacting with that Generator is faced with a difficult Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
**Failing that Skill Check '''instantly regresses''' the Generator by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''&#37;''' of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.

After ''Overcharge'' is applied to a Generator, the following effect also applies:
*'''Increases''' the Regression speed from '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">85 %</span>''' to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">130 %</span>''' over the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">30 seconds</span>'''.

You are fuelled by your hate for progress.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator applies Overcharge:

  • The next Survivor interacting with that Generator is faced with a difficult Skill Check.
    • Failing that Skill Check instantly regresses the Generator by 2/3/4 % of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.
After Overcharge is applied to a Generator, the following effect also applies:
  • Increases the Regression speed from 85 % to 130 % over the next 30 seconds.
"It is a trap, But a trap one must step in..." — Herman Carter
 Doctor
Overwhelming Presence

Just knowing you are near is enough to disturb your victims.
<p>Survivors within your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> suffer from inefficiency:
*When using an Item<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, its Depletion rate is increased by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">90</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">100</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

Just knowing you are near is enough to disturb your victims.

Survivors within your Terror Radius suffer from inefficiency:

  • When using an Item, its Depletion rate is increased by 80/90/100 %.
"Shit!! I dropped the gauze!"
 Doctor
Play with Your Food

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.

Each time you chase your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and let them escape, ''Play with Your Food'' receives '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">3 Tokens</span>''':
* Each Token applies a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''&#37;''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">15</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* Performing ''Basic Attacks'', or ''Special Attacks'' that can damage Survivors, consumes '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">1 Token</span>'''.
<p>''Play with Your Food'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10 seconds</span>''' on Token-accumulation.

''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Each time you chase your Obsession and let them escape, Play with Your Food receives 1 Token, up to a maximum of 3 Tokens:

  • Each Token applies a stack-able 3/4/5 % Haste Status Effect, up to a maximum of 9/12/15 %.
  • Performing Basic Attacks, or Special Attacks that can damage Survivors, consumes 1 Token.

Play with Your Food has a cool-down of 10 seconds on Token-accumulation.
You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"You've fooled them, haven't you Michael? But not me." — Dr Sam Loomis

 Shape
Pop Goes the Weasel

A deep bond with The Entity unlocks great strength.
<p>After hooking a Survivor, ''Pop Goes the Weasel'' activates for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">45</span>''' '''seconds''':
*Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> '''instantly regresses''' it by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">-30 %</span>''' of its current Progression
*Normal Generator Regression applies afterwards.

''Pop Goes the Weasel'' deactives after damaging a Generator or when its timer elapses.

A deep bond with The Entity unlocks great strength.

After hooking a Survivor, Pop Goes the Weasel activates for the next 35/40/45 seconds:

  • Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator instantly regresses it by -30 % of its current Progression
  • Normal Generator Regression applies afterwards.
Pop Goes the Weasel deactives after damaging a Generator or when its timer elapses.
 Clown
Predator

Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.
* The Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> left by Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> spawn '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">slightly</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">moderately</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">considerably</span>''' closer together.

Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.
  • The Scratch Marks left by Survivors spawn slightly/moderately/considerably closer together.

"Never stop moving and hope you're always two steps ahead of the beast." — Unknown, Notebook

 Wraith
Rancor

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.
<p>Each time a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is completed, the following effects apply:
* Reveals your Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to the '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''seconds'''.
* All Survivors' locations are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 seconds</span>'''.
<p>Once the Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are powered, the following effects apply:
* You are granted the ability to kill the '''''Obsession''''' by your own hand.
* The '''''Obsession''''' suffers from a permanent '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Each time a Generator is completed, the following effects apply:

  • Reveals your Aura to the Obsession for 5/4/3 seconds.
  • All Survivors' locations are revealed to you for 3 seconds.

Once the Exit Gates are powered, the following effects apply:

  • You are granted the ability to kill the Obsession by your own hand.
  • The Obsession suffers from a permanent Exposed Status Effect.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

 Spirit
Rapid Brutality

You move with a speed and fury that makes blood run cold.
*You no longer gain '''''Bloodlust<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.
*Successfully hitting a Survivor with a ''Basic Attack'' grants you a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">+5 %</span>''' '''''Haste<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You move with a speed and fury that makes blood run cold.
  • You no longer gain Bloodlust Status Effect.
  • Successfully hitting a Survivor with a Basic Attack grants you a +5 % Haste Status Effect for 8/9/10 seconds.
"Catch it, put it in the airlock, get rid of it." — Dallas
 Xenomorph
Remember Me

Whenever the '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Remember Me'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''':
*'''Increases''' the Gate Opening time by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">6 seconds</span>''' per accumulated Token, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">24</span>''' '''additional seconds''', affecting both Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
*The '''''Obsession''''' does not suffer from this penalty.

''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

Whenever the Obsession loses a Health State, Remember Me gains 1 Token:
  • Increases the Gate Opening time by 6 seconds per accumulated Token, up to a maximum of 12/18/24 additional seconds, affecting both Exit Gates.
  • The Obsession does not suffer from this penalty.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"You don't remember? You must. You're my number one, and you'll never wake up again." — Freddy Krueger

 Nightmare
Save the Best for Last

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.

Each time you hit a Survivor other than your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' with a ''Basic Attack'', ''Save the Best for Last'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">8 Tokens</span>''':
* Gain a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">5 %</span>''' Cool-down reduction on successful attacks per Token, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40 %</span>'''.
<p>Each time you hit your '''''Obsession''''' with a ''Basic Attack'', ''Save the Best for Last'' loses '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">2</span>''' '''Tokens'''.
* ''When the '''''Obsession''''' is sacrificed or killed, you can neither gain nor lose any more Tokens.''
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Each time you hit a Survivor other than your Obsession with a Basic Attack, Save the Best for Last gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 8 Tokens:

  • Gain a stack-able 5 % Cool-down reduction on successful attacks per Token, up to a maximum of 40 %.

Each time you hit your Obsession with a Basic Attack, Save the Best for Last loses 4/3/2 Tokens.

  • When the Obsession is sacrificed or killed, you can neither gain nor lose any more Tokens.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"Death has come to your little town, Sheriff." — Dr Sam Loomis

 Shape
Scourge Hook: Floods of Rage

You form a psychic connection with The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and alter the rules of the Trial.
<p>At the start of the Trial, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 random Hooks</span>''' are changed into '''Scourge Hooks''':
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of '''Scourge Hooks''' are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
<p>Each time a Survivor is unhooked from a '''Scourge Hook''', the following effects apply:
*The Auras of all other Survivors are revealed for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">7</span>''' '''seconds'''.


You form a psychic connection with The Entity and alter the rules of the Trial.

At the start of the Trial, 4 random Hooks are changed into Scourge Hooks:

  • The Auras of Scourge Hooks are revealed to you in white.

Each time a Survivor is unhooked from a Scourge Hook, the following effects apply:

  • The Auras of all other Survivors are revealed for 5/6/7 seconds.
 Onryō
Scourge Hook: Gift of Pain

You are the bringer of sweet pain.
<p>At the start of the Trial, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 random Hooks</span>''' are changed into '''Scourge Hooks''':
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of '''Scourge Hooks''' are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
<p>Each time a Survivor is unhooked from a '''Scourge Hook''', the following effects apply:
*The Survivor suffers from the '''''Haemorrhage<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Mangled<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects''' until healed.
*Upon being healed, the Survivor suffers from a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">13</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''&#37;''' Action Speed penalty to Healing and Repairing until they are injured again.

You are the bringer of sweet pain.

At the start of the Trial, 4 random Hooks are changed into Scourge Hooks:

  • The Auras of Scourge Hooks are revealed to you in white.

Each time a Survivor is unhooked from a Scourge Hook, the following effects apply:

  • The Survivor suffers from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects until healed.
  • Upon being healed, the Survivor suffers from a 10/13/16 % Action Speed penalty to Healing and Repairing until they are injured again.
"We will tear your soul apart." — Pinhead
 Cenobite
Scourge Hook: Hangman's Trick

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability and your ingenious modifications to Hooks alert you of tampering.
<p>At the start of the Trial, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 random Hooks</span>''' are changed into '''Scourge Hooks''':
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of '''Scourge Hooks''' are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
*Receive a ''Loud Noise Notification'', whenever a Survivor starts sabotaging a Hook<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
*While carrying a Survivor, the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''metres''' of a '''Scourge Hook''' are revealed to you.


Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability and your ingenious modifications to Hooks alert you of tampering.

At the start of the Trial, 4 random Hooks are changed into Scourge Hooks:

  • The Auras of Scourge Hooks are revealed to you in white.
  • Receive a Loud Noise Notification, whenever a Survivor starts sabotaging a Hook.
  • While carrying a Survivor, the Auras of all Survivors within 8/9/10 metres of a Scourge Hook are revealed to you.

"No excuses, no equivocations... No crying." — Amanda Young

 Pig
Scourge Hook: Monstrous Shrine

Your fervent care of the Hooks found in the Basement has aroused The Entity's interest.
<p>At the start of the Trial, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 random Hooks</span>''' and the four '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">Basement Hooks</span>''' are changed into '''Scourge Hooks''':
*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of '''Scourge Hooks''' are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.

Each time a Survivor is hooked onto a '''Scourge Hook''', the following effect applies whenever you are farther than '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">24 metres</span>''' from the hooked Survivor:
*'''Accelerates''' the Sacrifice Process by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

Your fervent care of the Hooks found in the Basement has aroused The Entity's interest.

At the start of the Trial, 4 random Hooks and the four Basement Hooks are changed into Scourge Hooks:

  • The Auras of Scourge Hooks are revealed to you in white.
Each time a Survivor is hooked onto a Scourge Hook, the following effect applies whenever you are farther than 24 metres from the hooked Survivor:
  • Accelerates the Sacrifice Process by 10/15/20 %.
"Then you will know that there is no escape. When hanging in the depths, you face the dark one."
 .All
Scourge Hook: Pain Resonance

Overwhelming pain reverberates outwards.
<p>At the start of the Trial, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 random Hooks</span>''' are changed into '''Scourge Hooks''':
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of '''Scourge Hooks''' are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
<p>Start the Trial with '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 Tokens</span>'''.
<p>Each time a Survivor is hooked on a '''Scourge Hook''' for the first time, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">1 Token</span>''' is consumed and the following effects apply:
*The Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> with the most Progression explodes and '''instantly regresses''' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''&#37;''' of its maximum possible Progression.
*Normal Generator Regression applies afterwards.
*All Survivors repairing that Generator will scream, but not reveal their location.

''Scourge Hook: Pain Resonance'' is disabled for the remainder of the Trial once all Tokens are consumed.

Overwhelming pain reverberates outwards.

At the start of the Trial, 4 random Hooks are changed into Scourge Hooks:

  • The Auras of Scourge Hooks are revealed to you in white.

Start the Trial with 4 Tokens.

Each time a Survivor is hooked on a Scourge Hook for the first time, 1 Token is consumed and the following effects apply:

  • The Generator with the most Progression explodes and instantly regresses by 15/20/25 % of its maximum possible Progression.
  • Normal Generator Regression applies afterwards.
  • All Survivors repairing that Generator will scream, but not reveal their location.
Scourge Hook: Pain Resonance is disabled for the remainder of the Trial once all Tokens are consumed.

"The pain spills beyond flesh/darkness staining the horizon." — Girl in the Shadow by Carmina Mora

 Artist
Septic Touch

The Land of the Shadows subsumes all. Healing only delays the inevitable.
*Whenever a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> performs a Healing action while they are inside your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, that Survivor suffers from the '''''Blindness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects'''
*These effects linger for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds''' after the Healing action is interrupted by any means.

The Land of the Shadows subsumes all. Healing only delays the inevitable.
  • Whenever a Survivor performs a Healing action while they are inside your Terror Radius, that Survivor suffers from the Blindness and Exhausted Status Effects
  • These effects linger for 6/8/10 seconds after the Healing action is interrupted by any means.
"Do not admit to fear, or pain, or doubt. These are the seeds from which darkness grows." — Otto Stamper
 Dredge
Shadowborn

You have a keen vision in the darkness of the night.
<p>
*'''Increases''' your ''Field of View'' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">9</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">15</span>''' '''&#176;'''.

''Shadowborn'' does not stack with ''Monitor & Abuse''.

You have a keen vision in the darkness of the night.

  • Increases your Field of View by 9/12/15 °.
Shadowborn does not stack with Monitor & Abuse.

"Shining in the darkest dark, his eyes pierce the night and sting your soul."

 Wraith
Shattered Hope

To capture your prey, you must first extinguish their hope.
*Instead of snuffing Boon Totems<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> you destroy them.
*Destroying a ''Boon Totem'' this way reveals the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors that were within its range at that moment for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''seconds'''.

To capture your prey, you must first extinguish their hope.
  • Instead of snuffing Boon Totems you destroy them.
  • Destroying a Boon Totem this way reveals the Auras of all Survivors that were within its range at that moment for 6/7/8 seconds.
"Nothing is permanent here. Nothing except our endless perdition." — Unknown, Notebook
 .All
Sloppy Butcher

You know where to hit to make them bleed.
<p>
*Wounds inflicted by ''Basic Attacks'' cause Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to suffer from the '''''Haemorrhage<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Mangled<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects'''.
*'''Increases''' the Bleeding frequency of injured Survivors by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">75</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">100</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
*'''Increases''' the Regression rate at which partial Healing Progression is lost because of '''''Haemorrhage''''' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
**Both '''Status Effects''' are removed once the Survivor is fully healed.

You know where to hit to make them bleed.

  • Wounds inflicted by Basic Attacks cause Survivors to suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects.
  • Increases the Bleeding frequency of injured Survivors by 50/75/100 %.
  • Increases the Regression rate at which partial Healing Progression is lost because of Haemorrhage by 15/20/25 %.
    • Both Status Effects are removed once the Survivor is fully healed.
"It is in its sadistic nature. There is no swift kill as it delights in the obscene spectacle of our agonising suffering."
 .All
Spies from the Shadows

Allows the Crows found in the environment to directly communicate with you.
*Whenever you are within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">36</span>''' '''metres''' of a Crow<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, who was startled by a nearby Survivor, you are alerted by a ''Loud Noise Notification''.

''Spies from the Shadows'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5 seconds</span>''' between alerts.

Allows the Crows found in the environment to directly communicate with you.
  • Whenever you are within 20/28/36 metres of a Crow, who was startled by a nearby Survivor, you are alerted by a Loud Noise Notification.

Spies from the Shadows has a cool-down of 5 seconds between alerts.

"In the shadows they torment, scarring our minds with each scream."

 .All
Spirit Fury

Each Pallet you break magnifies the wrath of The Entity.
<p>After breaking '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">2</span>''' '''Pallets''', ''Spirit Fury'' activates:
* The next time you are stunned by a Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> instantly breaks it.
* The normal Stun penalty still applies.
<p>''Spirit Fury'' deactivates after applying its effect.

Each Pallet you break magnifies the wrath of The Entity.

After breaking 4/3/2 Pallets, Spirit Fury activates:

  • The next time you are stunned by a Pallet, The Entity instantly breaks it.
  • The normal Stun penalty still applies.

Spirit Fury deactivates after applying its effect.

"Fury is her blood."

 Spirit
Starstruck

Your unmatched showmanship dazzles all.

When carrying a Survivor, ''Starstruck'' activates:
* Survivors suffer from the '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' while in your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
* The '''Status Effect''' lingers for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">26</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''' after leaving your Terror Radius.
<p>After hooking or dropping the carried Survivor, ''Starstruck'' deactivates:
* The '''Status Effect''' persists for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">26</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''' for any Survivor inside your Terror Radius at that moment.
<p>''Starstruck'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60 seconds</span>''' once the Survivor is no longer being carried.

Your unmatched showmanship dazzles all.

When carrying a Survivor, Starstruck activates:

  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect while in your Terror Radius.
  • The Status Effect lingers for 26/28/30 seconds after leaving your Terror Radius.

After hooking or dropping the carried Survivor, Starstruck deactivates:

  • The Status Effect persists for 26/28/30 seconds for any Survivor inside your Terror Radius at that moment.

Starstruck has a cool-down of 60 seconds once the Survivor is no longer being carried.

"Enjoy this moment, few get so close." — Ji-Woon Hak

 Trickster
Stridor

You are acutely sensitive to the breathing of your prey.
* '''Increases''' the volume of Survivors' ''Grunts of Pain'' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* '''Increases''' the volume of Survivors' regular breathing by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">0</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">0</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

You are acutely sensitive to the breathing of your prey.
  • Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by 25/50/50 %.
  • Increases the volume of Survivors' regular breathing by 0/0/25 %.

"If you do not stop and catch your breath... she will."

Superior Anatomy

Decades of research have culminated in you: something faster, stronger, and more dangerous than any human.
<p>When a Survivor performs a ''Rush Vault action'' within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8 metres</span>''' of you, ''Superior Anatomy'' activates:
*'''Increases''' your Vaulting speed by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40</span>''' '''&#37;''' the next time you vault a Window<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

''Superior Anatomy'' deactivates after vaulting.
<p>''Superior Anatomy'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.

Decades of research have culminated in you: something faster, stronger, and more dangerous than any human.

When a Survivor performs a Rush Vault action within 8 metres of you, Superior Anatomy activates:

  • Increases your Vaulting speed by 30/35/40 % the next time you vault a Window.
Superior Anatomy deactivates after vaulting.

Superior Anatomy has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

 Mastermind
Surveillance

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of regressing Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are highlighted in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
* If the Regression progress is interrupted on a Generator, its Aura will be highlighted in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Surveillance'' increases the audible range of Survivors' Generator-repairing noises by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8 metres</span>'''.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

The Auras of regressing Generators are highlighted in white.

  • If the Regression progress is interrupted on a Generator, its Aura will be highlighted in yellow for 8/12/16 seconds.

Surveillance increases the audible range of Survivors' Generator-repairing noises by 8 metres.
"Are you gonna behave?" — Amanda Young

 Pig
THWACK!

Your prey is terrified by your relentless pursuit.
<p>After hooking a Survivor, ''THWACK!'' activates:
*The next time you break a Breakable Wall<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or a Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, all Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">32</span>''' '''metres''' of your location will scream and reveal their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 seconds</span>'''.


Your prey is terrified by your relentless pursuit.

After hooking a Survivor, THWACK! activates:

  • The next time you break a Breakable Wall or a Pallet, all Survivors within 28/30/32 metres of your location will scream and reveal their Aura for 4 seconds.

"All those who stood in her path feared her mighty THWACK!" — Sonhadores Sombrios, Issue #3

 Skull Merchant
Terminus

You are a brilliant tactician who prepares for every eventuality.
<p>Once the Exit Gates<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are powered, ''Terminus'' activates:
*All Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, who are either injured, dying, or hooked, suffer from the '''''Broken<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' until the Exit Gates are opened.
**This effect lingers for an additional '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''' after the Exit Gates are open.


You are a brilliant tactician who prepares for every eventuality.

Once the Exit Gates are powered, Terminus activates:

  • All Survivors, who are either injured, dying, or hooked, suffer from the Broken Status Effect until the Exit Gates are opened.
    • This effect lingers for an additional 20/25/30 seconds after the Exit Gates are open.
 Mastermind
Territorial Imperative

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
<p>Whenever you are farther than '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24 metres</span>''' from the Basement<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while a Survivor enters it, ''Territorial Imperative'' activates:
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of that Survivor is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''seconds'''.


<p>''Territorial Imperative'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">45 seconds</span>'''.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

Whenever you are farther than 24 metres from the Basement while a Survivor enters it, Territorial Imperative activates:

  • The Aura of that Survivor is revealed to you for 4/5/6 seconds.

Territorial Imperative has a cool-down of 45 seconds.

 Huntress
Thanatophobia

Their courage fades in the face of their undeniable mortality.
* Each injured, dying, or hooked Survivor afflicts Survivors with a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">1.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">2</span>''' '''&#37;''' Action Speed penalty to Repairing, Sabotaging, and Cleansing, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''&#37;'''.
* '''Increases''' the Action Speed penalty by a further '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">12 %</span>''', if there are '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 Survivors</span>''', who are either injured, dying, or hooked at the same time.

Their courage fades in the face of their undeniable mortality.
  • Each injured, dying, or hooked Survivor afflicts Survivors with a stack-able 1/1.5/2 % Action Speed penalty to Repairing, Sabotaging, and Cleansing, up to a maximum of 4/6/8 %.
  • Increases the Action Speed penalty by a further 12 %, if there are 4 Survivors, who are either injured, dying, or hooked at the same time.

"She plays with us and revels in our pain."

 Nurse
Thrilling Tremors

Your dark designs and shrewd composure rouse The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

After picking up a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, all Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> not currently being repaired by Survivors are blocked by The Entity for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16 seconds</span>'''.
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of blocked Generators are highlighted to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
<p>''Thrilling Tremors'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Your dark designs and shrewd composure rouse The Entity.

After picking up a Survivor, all Generators not currently being repaired by Survivors are blocked by The Entity for the next 16 seconds.

  • The Auras of blocked Generators are highlighted to you in white.

Thrilling Tremors has a cool-down of 100/80/60 seconds.
"The night assists me and it's endless here." — The Ghost Face

 Ghost Face
Tinkerer

Whenever a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is repaired to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">70 %</span>''', you benefit from the following effects:
* Triggers a ''Loud Noise Notification'' for that Generator, revealing its location.
* Grants the '''''Undetectable<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">14</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Tinkerer'' can only trigger once per Generator per Trial.

Whenever a Generator is repaired to 70 %, you benefit from the following effects:
  • Triggers a Loud Noise Notification for that Generator, revealing its location.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for the next 12/14/16 seconds.

Tinkerer can only trigger once per Generator per Trial.

"The Hillbilly makes impressive tools out of scraps. Tools aimed at maiming us in creative ways." — Notebook

 Hillbilly
Trail of Torment

You guide your victims along a path of pain and punishment.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> activates ''Trail of Torment'':
*'''Grants''' the '''''Undetectable<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' until the Generator stops regressing.
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the damaged Generator is revealed to all Survivors in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.


<p>''Trail of Torment'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You guide your victims along a path of pain and punishment.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator activates Trail of Torment:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect until the Generator stops regressing.
  • The Aura of the damaged Generator is revealed to all Survivors in yellow.

Trail of Torment has a cool-down of 80/70/60 seconds.

 Executioner
Ultimate Weapon

When they spot you, they know the end is near.
<p>Whenever you open a Locker, ''Ultimate Weapon'' activates for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>''':
*Survivors entering your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> scream and reveal their location to you.
*Those Survivors suffer from the '''''Blindness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.

When they spot you, they know the end is near.

Whenever you open a Locker, Ultimate Weapon activates for 30 seconds:

  • Survivors entering your Terror Radius scream and reveal their location to you.
  • Those Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.
"I can't lie to you about your chances, but... you have my sympathies." — Ash
 Xenomorph
Unnerving Presence

Your presence alone instils great fear.
<p>Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> repairing or healing within your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> suffer from the following effects:
* '''Increases''' the Trigger odds of Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">10 %</span>'''.
* '''Decreases''' the Success zone of Skill Checks by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

Your presence alone instils great fear.

Survivors repairing or healing within your Terror Radius suffer from the following effects:

  • Increases the Trigger odds of Skill Check by 10 %.
  • Decreases the Success zone of Skill Checks by 40/50/60 %.

"Its presence befalls us."

 Trapper
Unrelenting

You recuperate faster from missed attacks made with your main weapon.
*'''Reduces''' the Cool-down of missed ''Basic Attacks'' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''&#37;'''.


You recuperate faster from missed attacks made with your main weapon.
  • Reduces the Cool-down of missed Basic Attacks by 20/25/30 %.
 .All
Whispers

You have a rudimentary understanding of The Entity's voice.
*Whenever at least one Survivor is within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">48</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">32</span>''' '''metres''' of your location, you hear the sporadic whispers of the Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You have a rudimentary understanding of The Entity's voice.
  • Whenever at least one Survivor is within 48/40/32 metres of your location, you hear the sporadic whispers of the Entity.
"It is unclear as to the motivations of The Fog, but it is undeniable that it often takes the beast's side." — Unknown, Notebook
 .All
Zanshin Tactics

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

You are mentally alert and aware of key points on the battlefield.

The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Breakable Walls<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Pallets<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and Windows<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are revealed to you within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">28</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">32</span>''' '''metres'''.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

You are mentally alert and aware of key points on the battlefield.
The Auras of Breakable Walls, Pallets, and Windows are revealed to you within 24/28/32 metres.

"Within your enemy's strength is weakness." — Renjiro's Doctrine 12:5
 Oni


History

Please refer to the Sub-Article in order to see the various changes to Perks as a mechanic throughout Dead by Daylight's history:

  • Perks/History


Change Log

Patch 1.1.0

  • Added Kindred as a new General Survivor Perk.

Patch 1.3.1

  • Added Hex: Thrill of the Hunt as a new General Killer Perk.

Patch 4.3.0

  • Unified all Perk Rarities to match the Tier system:
    • Tier I Perks are Uncommon
    • Tier II Perks are Rare
    • Tier III Perks are Very Rare

Patch 5.3.0

  • Replaced all Perks associated with CHAPTER 13: Stranger Things with equivalent General Perks that feature new Perk icons, if the old icon showed one of the Stranger Things Characters:
    • Perks formerly unique to Nancy Wheeler:
      • Better Together became Situational Awareness
      • Fixated became Self-Aware
      • Inner Strength became Inner Healing
    • Perks formerly unique to Steve Harrington:
      • Babysitter became Guardian
      • Camaraderie became Kinship
      • Second Wind became Renewal
    • Perks formerly unique to The Demogorgon:
      • Surge became Jolt
      • Cruel Limits became Claustrophobia
      • Mindbreaker became Fearmonger
  • Players who own CHAPTER 13 will still see the old Perk icons with the Stranger Things Characters and hovering over the Perks will still claim that they belong to their Stranger Things Character, despite working exactly like all General Perks now.

Patch 6.0.0

  • Added Shattered Hope as a new General Killer Perk.

Patch 6.1.0

  • Removed the mechanic of Teachable Perks.
    • This change was motivated by unique Character Perks now unlocking through the Prestige System.


Trivia

  • In the Dark was an early concept version of what would become Knock Out.
  • Last Standing was an early version of what would become Left Behind.
